ref: 威尔士 AM 担心”像蠢蛋“
src: Welsh AMs worried about 'looking like muppets'

ref: 有人提议，AM 应该将头衔改为 MWP（威尔士议会议员），这让好多 AM 大为震惊。
src: There is consternation among some AMs at a suggestion their title should change to MWPs (Member of the Welsh Parliament).

ref: 之所以有人这样提议，是因为计划要将议会名称改为“威尔士议会”。
src: It has arisen because of plans to change the name of the assembly to the Welsh Parliament.

ref: 政治界的 AM 担心这会惹人嘲笑。
src: AMs across the political spectrum are worried it could invite ridicule.

ref: 一名工党 AM 表示，工党成员担心“这个名称与 Twp 和 Pwp 押韵”。
src: One Labour AM said his group was concerned "it rhymes with Twp and Pwp."

ref: （非威尔士读者须知：在威尔士语中，twp 的意思为“愚蠢”，pwp 意思为“大便”。
src: For readers outside of Wales: In Welsh twp means daft and pwp means poo.

ref: 一名民族党 AM 表示，整个民族党人员都“不满意“，建议换成其他名称。
src: A Plaid AM said the group as a whole was "not happy" and has suggested alternatives.

ref: 一名威尔士保守党人表示，保守党对这次更名“持开放态度”，但指出，发音上很容易将 MWP 发成 Muppet 的音。
src: A Welsh Conservative said his group was "open minded" about the name change, but noted it was a short verbal hop from MWP to Muppet.

ref: 在该语境下，威尔士字母 w 的发音类似于约克郡英语字母 u 的发音。
src: In this context The Welsh letter w is pronounced similarly to the Yorkshire English pronunciation of the letter u.

ref: 议会委员会 (Assembly Commission) 目前正在对名称变更起草法律，他说：“关于委员会成员最终决定选择用什么名字，这是他们自己的事情。”
src: The Assembly Commission, which is currently drafting legislation to introduce the name changes, said: "The final decision on any descriptors of what Assembly Members are called will of course be a matter for the members themselves."

ref: 《2017 年威尔士政府法案》规定，威尔士议会有更名的权力。
src: The Government of Wales Act 2017 gave the Welsh assembly the power to change its name.

ref: 6 月，委员会公布了关于这些名称提议的公众咨询结果，普遍支持使用”威尔士议会“这一名称。
src: In June, the Commission published the results of a public consultation on the proposals which found broad support for calling the assembly a Welsh Parliament.

ref: 关于 AM 的头衔问题，委员会赞倾向于 WMP（威尔士议会议员），但公众咨询结果中，支持率最高的是 MWP 。
src: On the matter of the AMs' title, the Commission favoured Welsh Parliament Members or WMPs, but the MWP option received the most support in a public consultation.

ref: 显然，AM 建议采用其他名称，但会议主席 Elin Jones 感到头痛的是，迟迟达不成一致，因为他要在几周内提交名称变更的立法草案。
src: AMs are apparently suggesting alternative options, but the struggle to reach consensus could be a headache for the Presiding Officer, Elin Jones, who is expected to submit draft legislation on the changes within weeks.

ref: 关于改革的立法还会纳入议会运作方式的其他变更内容，包括取消 AM 资格的规则和委员会制度的设计。
src: The legislation on the reforms will include other changes to the way the assembly works, including rules on disqualification of AMs and the design of the committee system.

ref: AM 将在立法辩论时，对最终名称进行投票。
src: AMs will get the final vote on the question of what they should be called when they debate the legislation.

ref: 马其顿就更改国名举行公投
src: Macedonians go to polls in referendum on changing country's name

ref: 选民们将于周日进行投票，以表决是否将国名更改为“北马其顿共和国”。
src: Voters will vote Sunday on whether to change their country's name to the "Republic of North Macedonia."

ref: 直接投票是为了解决马其顿与邻国希腊之间长达数十年的争端问题，希腊有一个省也叫马其顿。
src: The popular vote was set up in a bid to resolve a decades-long dispute with neighboring Greece, which has its own province called Macedonia.

ref: 雅典方面一直坚称其北部邻国的名字意味着希腊对其领土具有合法权利，并多次拒绝马其顿加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO)。
src: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has repeatedly objected to its membership bids for the EU and NATO.

ref: 马其顿总统奥尔基·伊万诺夫 (Gjorge Ivanov) 是此次更名公民投票的反对者，他表示不会参与投票。
src: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, an opponent of the plebiscite on the name change, has said he will disregard the vote.

ref: 然而，包括总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 在内的公投支持者们认为，更名不过是加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 所要付出的必然代价。
src: However, supporters of the referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that the name change is simply the price to pay to join the EU and NATO.

ref: 哈萊姆区的教堂岌岌可危，圣马丁教堂的钟声陷入沉寂
src: The Bells of St. Martin's Fall Silent as Churches in Harlem Struggle

ref: “历史上我曾经约谈过的老人们都说，每个角落都会有一家酒吧和一座教堂，”亚当斯 (Adams) 说到。
src: "Historically, the old people I've talked to say there was a bar and a church on every corner," Mr. Adams said.

ref: “如今，这里既没有酒吧，也没有教堂。”
src: "Today, there's neither."

ref: 他说酒吧的消失是情理之中的。
src: He said the disappearance of bars was understandable.

ref: “如今，人们开始以不同的方式参与社交”，亚当斯表示。
src: "People socialize in a different way" nowadays, he said.

ref: “酒吧不再是人们定期光顾的街区客厅。”
src: "Bars are no longer neighborhood living rooms where people go on a regular basis."

ref: 至于教堂，他担心出售资产的资金并不会支撑到如领导人们预期的那样持久，“资金迟早会归零”。
src: As for churches, he worries that the money from selling assets will not last as long as leaders expect it to, "and sooner or later they'll be right back where they started."

ref: 他补充道，教堂将被公寓大楼所取代，而公寓中住着的是那些不会帮助维护街区剩余避难所的人们。
src: Churches, he added, could be replaced by apartment buildings with condominiums filled with the kind of people who will not help the neighborhood's remaining sanctuaries.

ref: “在这些建筑中购买公寓的绝大多数都将是白人”，他说道，“因此，这也将加速教堂的全面关闭，因为大多数搬进这些公寓的人们不太可能会成为教堂的成员”。
src: "The overwhelming majority of people who buy condominiums in these buildings will be white," he said, "and therefore will hasten the day that these churches close altogether because it is unlikely that most of these people who move into these condominiums will become members of these churches."

ref: 这两座教堂均在圣马丁教堂建成十年后，哈萊姆区成为黑人都市（1870 年的都会社区）之前由白人会众建造。
src: Both churches were built by white congregations before Harlem became a black metropolis - Metropolitan Community in 1870, St. Martin's a decade later.

ref: 最初的白人卫理公会会众于 20 世纪 30 年代迁出。
src: The original white Methodist congregation moved out in the 1930s.

ref: 在附近做礼拜的一名黑人会众获得了这座建筑的所有权。
src: A black congregation that had been worshiping nearby took title to the building.

ref: 在约翰·霍华德·约翰逊 (John Howard Johnson) 牧师的领导下，圣马丁教堂被一名黑人会众接管，约翰逊牧师曾领导一场抵制 125 街 (125 Street) 零售商的运动，125 街是哈萊姆区一条主要的购物街，但是拒绝雇用或提拔黑人。
src: St. Martin's was taken over by a black congregation under the Rev. John Howard Johnson, who led a boycott of retailers on 125th Street, a main street for shopping in Harlem, who resisted hiring or promoting blacks.

ref: 1939 年的一场大火对建筑造成严重损毁，但是由于约翰逊教父的教区居民计划重建教堂，他们顺便委托制造了钟琴。
src: A fire in 1939 left the building badly damaged, but as Father Johnson's parishioners made plans to rebuild, they commissioned the carillon.

ref: 约翰逊教父的儿子，圣马丁教堂的继承人大卫·约翰逊 (David Johnson) 牧师傲慢地将钟琴称为“穷人的铃声”。
src: The Rev. David Johnson, Father Johnson's son and successor at St. Martin's, proudly called the carillon "the poor people's bells."

ref: 在七月曾演奏钟琴的专业人士却将其称为：“文化瑰宝”和“无可取代的历史性乐器”。
src: The expert who played the carillon in July called it something else: "A cultural treasure" and "an irreplaceable historical instrument."

ref: 这位专业人士，密歇根大学的 Tiffany Ng 还指出，这是世界上第一台由黑人乐师演奏的钟琴，这位乐师名为 Dionisio A. Lind，18 年前搬到河滨教堂演奏更大的钟琴。
src: The expert, Tiffany Ng of the University of Michigan, also noted that it was the first carillon in the world to be played by a black musician, Dionisio A. Lind, who moved to the larger carillon at the Riverside Church 18 years ago.

ref: 梅利韦瑟 (Merriweather) 称圣马丁教堂并没有找人取代他的位置。
src: Mr. Merriweather said that St. Martin's did not replace him.

ref: 过去几个月圣马丁教堂发生的事情是一个有关建筑师和承包商的复杂故事，这些建筑师和承包商的其中一些是由教堂的俗世领导人带来的，另一些是由主教教区带来的。
src: What has played out at St. Martin's over the last few months has been a complicated tale of architects and contractors, some brought in by the lay leaders of the church, others by the Episcopal diocese.

ref: 教区的管理机构（教区委员会，由俗世领导人组成）曾在七月时给教区写信，表示担心“教区试图将资本转嫁给教区委员会”，尽管教区委员并会没有参与雇用教区递送过来的建筑师和承包商。
src: The vestry - the parish's governing body, made up of lay leaders - wrote the diocese in July with concerns that the diocese "would seek to pass along the costs" to the vestry, even though the vestry had not been involved in hiring the architects and contractors the diocese sent in.

ref: 一些教区居民抱怨称教区行事方面缺乏透明度。
src: Some parishioners complained of a lack of transparency on the diocese's part.

ref: 加州一 13 岁男童在潜水捕捞龙虾时被鲨鱼咬伤
src: Shark injures 13-year-old on lobster dive in California

ref: 官方表示，周六，加州龙虾捕捞季开幕当天，一名 13 岁男童在潜水捕龙虾时被鲨鱼袭击咬伤。
src: A shark attacked and injured a 13-year-old boy Saturday while he was diving for lobster in California on the opening day of lobster season, officials said.

ref: 袭击于早上 7 点前发生在恩西尼塔斯 Beacon 海滩附近。
src: The attack occurred just before 7 a.m. near Beacon's Beach in Encinitas.

ref: 乍得 哈梅尔 (Chad Hammel) 在圣地亚哥接受 KSWB 电视台采访时表示，周六早上，他和朋友们一同潜水，大概半小时后，听到一名男童大声呼救，于是一行人上前将他拖出水面。
src: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego he had been diving with friends for about half an hour Saturday morning when he heard the boy screaming for help and then paddled over with a group to help pull him out of the water.

ref: 哈梅尔说，开始他以为男童是因为抓到龙虾太过兴奋，但后来他“意识到男童在大喊，‘我被咬了！
src: Hammel said at first he thought it was just excitement of catching a lobster, but then he "realized that he was yelling, 'I got bit!

ref: 我被咬了！’
src: I got bit!'

ref: 他的整个锁骨都被撕开了”，哈梅尔说他一到男童身边就注意到了。
src: His whole clavicle was ripped open," Hammel said he noticed once he got to the boy.

ref: “我呼喊大家把他拉出水面：‘水里有鲨鱼！’”哈梅尔又说到。
src: "I yelled at everyone to get out of the water: 'There's a shark in the water!'" Hammel added.

ref: 男孩被空运到圣地亚哥雷迪儿童医院 (Rady Children's Hospital)，目前情况危急。
src: The boy was airlifted to Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego where he is listed in critical condition.

ref: 袭击事件中的鲨鱼种类尚不明确。
src: The species of shark responsible for the attack was unknown.

ref: 救生员拉里·贾尔斯 (Larry Giles) 上尉在新闻发布会上表示，几周前在该地区发现了一条鲨鱼，但已确定不会对人类构成危险。
src: Lifeguard Capt. Larry Giles said at a media briefing that a shark had been spotted in the area a few weeks earlier, but it was determined not to be a dangerous species of shark.

ref: 贾尔斯补充到，受害者的上半身受到创伤。
src: Giles added the victim sustained traumatic injuries to his upper torso area.

ref: 出于调查和安全考虑，官方将 Casablad 的 Ponto 海滩至恩西尼塔斯的 Swami 海滩关闭 48 小时。
src: Officials shut down beach access from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's in Ecinitas for 48 hours for investigation and safety purposes.

ref: 贾尔斯表示该地区有 135 种以上的鲨鱼，但是大部分都不会对人类构成危险。
src: Giles noted that there are more than 135 shark species in the area, but most are not considered dangerous.

ref: Sainsbury's计划进军英国美容市场
src: Sainsbury's plans push into UK beauty market

ref: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司 (Sainsbury’s) 要采用博姿 (Boots)、Superdrug 和德本汉姆百货公司 (Debenhams) 的百货公司风格，开设配备专业助理的美容通道。
src: Sainsbury's is taking on Boots, Superdrug and Debenhams with department store-style beauty aisles staffed with specialist assistants.

ref: 随着大量百货公司进军英国价值 28 亿英镑的美容市场，而且在时尚和家居用品销售回落期间，这一市场仍在持续增长而，将在全国 11 家商铺进行美容通道测试，如果测试成功，则将在明年推广到更多店铺。
src: As part of a substantial push into the UK's £2.8bn beauty market, which is continuing to grow while fashion and homeware sales fall back, the larger beauty aisles will be tested out in 11 stores around the country and taken to more stores next year if it proves a success.

ref: 由于超市的电视机、微波炉和家居用品货架一度被起诉，超市决定投资美容产品，利用这些货架空间。
src: The investment in beauty comes as supermarkets hunt for ways to use up shelf space once sued for TVs, microwaves and homeware.

ref: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司表示，将把美容产品的规模扩大一倍，推出 3000 多种产品，包括露华浓 (Revlon)、Essie、Tweezerman 和 Dr. PawPaw 等品牌。
src: Sainsbury's said it would be doubling the size of its beauty offering to up to 3,000 products, including brands such as Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman and Dr. PawPaw for the first time.

ref: 欧莱雅 (L’oreal)、美宝莲 (Maybelline) 和伯特蜂 (Burt's Bees) 等现有品牌也将获得更大的空间，拥有与 Boots 等商店类似的品牌区域。
src: Existing ranges from L'Oreal, Maybelline and Burt's Bees will also get more space with branded areas similar to those found in shops like Boots.

ref: 这家超市还重新推出了自己的精品化妆品系列，以使大多数产品都是纯素食产品——这是越来越多的年轻购物者的要求所在。
src: The supermarket is also relaunching its Boutique makeup range so that the majority of products are vegan-friendly - something increasingly demanded by younger shoppers.

ref: 此外，香水零售商 Fragrance Shop 将在塞恩斯伯里的两家门店进行特许经营试营业。第一家上周在伦敦南部的克罗伊登 (Croydon) 开店，另一家将于今年年末，在伯明翰的 Selly Oak 开业。
src: In addition, perfume retailer the Fragrance Shop will be testing out concessions in two Sainsbury's stores, the first of which opened in Croydon, south London, last week while a second opens in Selly Oak, Birmingham, later this year.

ref: 当前的主打趋势是网上购物，以及每天在当地便利店购买少量食品，这就意味着，超市必须采取更多措施，吸引人们前来光顾。
src: Online shopping and a shift towards buying small amounts of food daily at local convenience stores means supermarkets are having to do more to persuade people to visit.

ref: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司首席执行官迈克·库普 (Mike Coupe) 表示，这家连锁超市会提供更多服务和非食品来反击折扣商阿尔迪 (Aldi) 和利德尔 (Lidl)，这些门店将越来越像百货商店。
src: Mike Coupe, the chief executive of Sainsbury's, has said the outlets will look increasingly like department stores as the supermarket chain tries to fight back against the discounters Aldi and Lidl with more services and non-food.

ref: 自两年前收购这两家连锁店以来，塞恩斯伯里百货公司一直在数百家门店开设 Argos 门店，并引入了一些 Habitat。该公司表示，收购提振了杂货销售，带来了利润。
src: Sainsbury's has been putting Argos outlets in hundreds of stores and has also introduced a number of Habitats since it bought both chains two years ago, which it says has bolstered grocery sales and made the acquisitions more profitable.

ref: 这家超市之前也曾尝试过改造美容和药房，但以失败告终。
src: The supermarket's previous attempt to revamp its beauty and pharmacy departments ended in failure.

ref: 21 世纪初，塞恩斯伯里与博姿共同试运营了一家合资企业，但在就如何从博姿超市的药店中分取收入的问题上发生争执后，双方的合作宣告结束。
src: Sainsbury's tested a joint venture with Boots in the early 2000s, but the tie-up ended after a row over how to split the revenues from the chemist's stores in its supermarkets.

ref: 三年前，塞恩斯伯里提出了新战略，将 281 家门店的药店业务，以 1.25 亿英镑卖给了 Lloyds Pharmacy 连锁药店的所有者 Celesio。
src: The new strategy comes after Sainsbury's sold its 281-store pharmacy business to Celesio, the owner of the Lloyds Pharmacy chain, for £125m, three years ago.

ref: 该公司表示，Lloyds Pharmacy 将在四家门店增加一系列奢侈护肤品品牌，包括 La Roche-Posay 和 Vichy，故而会在该计划中发挥重要作用。
src: It said Lloyds would play a role in the plan, by adding an extended range of luxury skincare brands including La Roche-Posay and Vichy in four stores.

ref: 塞恩斯伯里百货公司的商业总监保罗·米尔斯-希克斯 (Paul Mills-Hicks) 说道: “我们已经改变了美容通道的外观和氛围，为客户改善了环境。”
src: Paul Mills-Hicks, Sainsbury's commercial director, said: "We've transformed the look and feel of our beauty aisles to enhance the environment for our customers.

ref: 我们还投资引入了受过特殊培训的同事，他们将在现场提供建议。
src: We've also invested in specially trained colleagues who will be on hand to offer advice.

ref: 我们的一系列品牌都是为满足每一种需求而设计的，诱人的环境和便利的地理位置意味着我们现在是一个引人注目的美容目的地，将成为传统购物方式的一大挑战。
src: Our range of brands is designed to suit every need and the alluring environment and convenient locations mean we're now a compelling beauty destination which challenges the old way of shopping."

ref: 在霍莉·威洛比 (Holly Willoughby) 退出 1100 万英镑的交易之后，彼得琼斯 (Peter Jones)“大为震怒”
src: Peter Jones 'furious' after Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal

ref: 电视节目主持人霍莉·威洛比 (Holly Willoughby) 退出 1100 万英镑的生活方式品牌业务交易，转而集中与 Marks and Spencer 与 ITV 签订的新合同，这让《龙穴》(Dragons Den) 明星彼得·琼斯 (Peter Jones) “大为震怒”
src: Dragons Den star Peter Jones left 'furious' after TV presenter Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal with his lifestyle brand business to focus on her new contracts with Marks and Spencer and ITV

ref: 威洛比没有时间投入到他们的家居服饰和配饰品牌 Truly。
src: Willoughby has no time for their homewear and accessories brand Truly.

ref: 这对搭档的业务好比是 Gwyneth Paltrow 的 Goop 品牌。
src: The pair's business had been likened to Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand.

ref: 这位 37 岁的《This Morning》节目主持人在 Instagram 宣布了自己要退出的决定。
src: This Morning presenter, 37, took to Instagram to announce she is leaving.

ref: 霍莉·威洛比在最后一刻，退出了利润丰厚的生活方式品牌业务，转而投向与 Marks＆Spencer 和 ITV 签订的丰厚的新合同，这让《龙穴》明星彼得·琼斯大为震怒。
src: Holly Willoughby has left Dragons" Den star Peter Jones fuming by pulling out of their lucrative lifestyle brand business at the last minute - to focus on her own new bumper contracts with Marks & Spencer and ITV.

src: Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's magnificent representation of Cromwell is evidence of 19th century opinion and part of the historiography of a figure who many believe is still worth celebrating.

ref: 金史密斯向《星期日电讯报》透露：“克伦威尔被很多人认为是国会抵抗外部压力（就他而言，也就是君主制）的捍卫者，如今这么认为的人可能会少于 19 世纪晚期。
src: Mr Goldsmith told The Sunday Telegraph: "Cromwell is regarded by many, perhaps more in the late 19th century than today, as a defender of parliament against external pressure, in his case of course the monarchy.

ref: 这一表述是否完全准确，一直是历史争论的主题。
src: Whether that is a wholly accurate representation is the subject of continuing historical debate.

ref: 但可以肯定的是，17 世纪中期的冲突影响了我们国家后来的发展，克伦威尔是一个因代表分裂的一方而获得认可的人物。
src: What is certain is that the conflict of the mid 17th century has shaped the subsequent development of our nation, and Cromwell is an individual recognisable figure who represents one side of that divide.

ref: 他作为护国公所取得的成就也值得庆祝和纪念的。”
src: His achievements as Lord Protector are also worth celebrating and commemorating."

ref: “杀人猪”将中国农户撕咬致死
src: Killer Pig Mauls Chinese Farmer to Death

ref: 据当地媒体报道，在中国西南部地区的一家市场上，一位农户被一头猪袭击致死。
src: A farmer was attacked and killed by a pig in a market in southwest China, according to local media reports.

ref: 据《南华早报》周六报道，在贵州省六盘水市一家市场的猪圈附近，一名袁姓男子被发现已经死亡，该男子动脉被割断，满身是血。
src: The man, identified only by his surname "Yuan," was found dead with a severed artery, covered in blood near a sty at the market in Liupanshui in Guizhou province, the South China Morning Post reported Sunday.

ref: 2005 年 5 月 30 日，中国青海省西宁市一家养猪场的养猪户正准备给猪注射疫苗。
src: A pig farmer prepares to inject vaccines into pigs at a hoggery on May 30, 2005 in Xining of Qinghai Province, China.

ref: 据报道，该养猪户及其堂兄周三从邻省云南赶到当地市场来售卖 15 头猪。
src: He had reportedly travelled with his cousin from the neighboring Yunnan province Wednesday to sell 15 pigs at the market.

ref: 第二天早上，他的堂兄发现该养猪户已经死亡，并且临近猪舍的门开着。
src: The following morning, his cousin found him dead, and discovered a door to a neighbouring pig sty open.

ref: 他介绍称，那间猪圈里有一头体型较大的公猪，嘴里满是鲜血。
src: He said that in the sty was a large male pig with blood on its mouth.

ref: 据报道，经法医鉴定证实，那只 550 磅的肥猪将该农民袭击致死。
src: A forensic examination confirmed that the 550 pound hog had mauled the farmer to death, according to the report.

ref: 援引《贵阳晚间新闻》消息，“我堂弟的腿部血肉模糊，惨不忍睹”，吴姓堂兄说到。
src: "My cousin's legs were bloody and mangled," the cousin, referred to by his surname "Wu," said, as quoted by the Guiyang Evening News.

ref: 监控录像显示，袁姓男子于周四早上 4：40 分进入市场喂猪。
src: Security camera footage showed Yuan entering the market at 4.40 am Thursday to feed his pigs.

ref: 而他的尸体在大约一小时之后被发现。
src: His body was found about an hour later.

ref: 但是致其死亡的肥猪既不属于袁姓男子也不属于其堂兄。
src: The animal who killed the man did not belong to Yuan or his cousin.

ref: 市场管理员向《晚间新闻》透露，这只肥猪已经被锁了起来，防止其再次攻击他人，同时警方正在现场收集证据。
src: A market manager told the Evening News that the pig had been locked away to prevent it attacking anyone else, while police gathered evidence at the scene.

ref: 据报道，袁姓男子的家人和市场当局正在协商其死亡赔偿问题。
src: Yuan's family and market authorities are reportedly negotiating compensation for his death.

ref: 尽管较为罕见，但之前也曾报道过猪攻击人类的事件。
src: Though rare, cases of pigs attacking humans have been recorded before.

ref: 2016 年，在马萨诸塞州的一家农场，一头猪攻击了一名妇女和她的丈夫，致使二人受重伤。
src: In 2016, a pig attacked a woman and her husband at their farm in Massachusetts, leaving the man with critical injuries.

ref: 十年前，一只 650 磅的肥猪将威尔士一名农户按在拖拉机上，直至他的妻子赶来把这只牲畜吓跑。
src: Ten years previously, a 650 pound pig pinned a Welsh farmer to his tractor until his wife scared the animal away.

ref: 2012 年，俄勒冈州的一名农户被自己的猪吞掉，马尼托巴湖的一名农户向加拿大广播公司新闻网 (CBC News) 透露称，猪通常不具有攻击性，但是血液的味道可以起到“触发剂”的作用。
src: After an Oregon farmer was eaten by his pigs in 2012, one Manitoba farmer told CBC News that pigs are not normally aggressive but the taste of blood can act as a "trigger."

ref: “它们只是喜欢嬉戏打闹。
src: "They're just being playful.

ref: 它们像孩子一样，充满好奇......它们并没有想伤害你。
src: They're nippers, very inquisitive ... they aren't out to hurt you.

ref: 你只需要给予它们适当的尊重”，他说到。
src: You just have to pay them the right amount of respect," he said.

ref: 飓风残余“罗莎”将继续为美国西南部带来大范围暴雨
src: Hurricane Rosa's remnants to bring widespread heavy rain to southwest US

ref: 飓风"罗莎" (Rosa) 继续向墨西哥北海岸移动，如预报所示，在抵达这块凉爽的海域后，风势有所减弱。
src: As forecast, Hurricane Rosa is weakening as it moves over the cooler waters of the northern coast of Mexico.

ref: 但预计在未来几天时间，罗莎还会给墨西哥北部及美国西南部带来大范围的暴雨和闪洪。
src: However, Rosa will bring flooding rains across northern Mexico and the southwest U.S. over the coming days.

ref: 周日东部时间早上 5 点，“罗莎”的中心位于墨西哥 Punta Eugenia 西南 385 英里，风速为 85 英里/小时，属于 1 级飓风。
src: Rosa had winds of 85 mph, a Category 1 Hurricane, as of 5 a.m. Eastern time Sunday, and was located 385 miles southwest of Punta Eugenia, Mexico.

ref: 预计“罗莎”将于周日继续北上。
src: Rosa is expected to move north on Sunday.

ref: 与此同时，太平洋上开始形成低谷，向东移向美国西海岸。“罗莎”将于周一形成热带风暴，靠近下加利福尼亚半岛，届时，深层热带湿气将向北进军美国西南部。
src: Meanwhile, a trough is beginning to take shape over the Pacific Ocean and move east toward the West Coast of the U.S. As Rosa approaches the Baja California peninsula on Monday as a tropical storm it will begin to push deep tropical moisture northward into the southwest U.S.

ref: 周一，“罗莎”将为墨西哥部分地区带来 10 英寸的降雨量。
src: Rosa will bring up to 10 inches of rain in parts of Mexico on Monday.

ref: 之后，热带湿气与即将到来的波谷相互作用，将在未来几天内，在西南地区造成大范围强降雨。
src: Then, tropical moisture interacting with the approaching trough will create widespread heavy rainfall in the Southwest over the coming days.

ref: 就当地而言，1 至 4 英寸的降雨量便会造成洪水泛滥、泥石流，甚至可能导致沙漠发生山体滑坡。
src: Locally, 1 to 4 inches of rain will cause dangerous flash flooding, debris flows and possibility landslides in the desert.

ref: 深层热带湿气的影响，将使降雨量达到每小时 2 至 3 英寸的高度，特别是在内华达州南部和亚利桑那州的部分地区。
src: Deep tropical moisture will cause rainfall rates to approach 2 to 3 inches per hour in spots, especially in parts of southern Nevada and Arizona.

ref: 预计西南部分地区的降雨量将达 2 至 4 英寸，特别是在亚利桑那州的大部分地区。
src: As much as 2 to 4 inches of rain is expected in parts of the Southwest, especially over much of Arizona.

ref: 由于热带雨具有分散性，伴随条件的快速恶化，可能会出现洪水泛滥。
src: Flash flooding is possible with rapidly deteriorating conditions due to the scattered nature of tropical rain.

ref: 由于热带降雨的威胁，沙漠冒险活动将十分危险。
src: It would be extremely ill advised to venture out into the desert on foot with the threat of tropical rainfall.

ref: 大雨可能导致峡谷形成湍急的河流，雷雨会带来局部阵风和飞尘。
src: Heavy rain could cause canyons to become raging rivers and thunderstorms will bring locally gusty winds and blowing dust.

ref: 即将抵达的波谷，将给南加州海岸的部分地区带来局部大雨。
src: The approaching trough will bring some locally heavy rain to parts of the Southern California coastline.

ref: 降雨总量可能会超过半英寸，这可能会导致轻微泥石流和道路打滑。
src: Rainfall totals of over half an inch are possible, which could cause minor debris flows and slick roadways.

ref: 这将是该地区进入雨季以来的第一场降雨。
src: This would be the region's first rainfall of their wet season.

ref: 周日晚间及周一早上，亚利桑那州将迎来分散性热带阵雨，之后，周一晚间及周二的降雨范围将扩大。
src: Some scattered tropical rain showers will begin to approach Arizona late Sunday and early Monday, before the rain becomes more widespread late Monday and Tuesday.

ref: 大雨将在周二蔓延到 Four Corners，并将一直持续到周三。
src: Heavy rain will spread into the Four Corners on Tuesday and last through Wednesday.

ref: 由于北极变冷，而热带地区仍然相当温暖，十月，美国各地的温度将经历剧烈波动。
src: October can see some intense temperature swings across the U.S. as the Arctic gets cooler, but the tropics remain quite warm.

ref: 这种情况有时会导致短距离内，温度发生剧烈变化。
src: Sometimes this leads to dramatic changes in temperature over short distances.

ref: 周日，美国中部便会出现巨大温差。
src: There is a great example of dramatic temperature differences through the central U.S. on Sunday.

ref: 密苏里州的堪萨斯城和内布拉斯加州的奥马哈之间，以及爱荷华州的圣路易斯和得梅因之间的温差将达到接近 20 度。
src: There is nearly a 20-degree temperature difference between Kansas City, Missouri, and Omaha, Nebraska, and between St. Louis and Des Moines, Iowa.

ref: 接下来的几天里，将再次迎来挥之不去的暑热，范围将扩大。
src: Over the next few days, lingering summer warmth will try to build and expand again.

ref: 预计美国中部和东部的大部分地区将在 10 月份开始迎来暑热，从南部平原到东北部分地区，大范围温度将达到 80 华氏度（约 27 摄氏度）。
src: Much of the central and eastern U.S. is expected to see a warm start to October with widespread 80s from the Southern Plains to parts of the Northeast.

ref: 纽约市周二气温也可能达到 80 华氏度（约 27 摄氏度），与平均水平相比，将高出约 10 华氏度。
src: New York City could reach 80 degrees on Tuesday, which would be approximately 10 degrees above average.

ref: 长期气候预测显示，截至 10 月上半月，美国东部的气温高于平均水平。
src: Our long term climate forecast is indicating high chances for above-average temperatures for the eastern U.S. through the first half of October.

ref: 超过 2000 万人观看 Brett Kavanaugh 听证会
src: More than 20 million people watched Brett Kavanaugh hearing

ref: 周四，最高法院候选人布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 与指控其在 20 世纪 80 年代对自己进行过性侵的女人克里斯蒂娜·布拉西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 的听证会在六个电视网络上播出，引来超过 2000 万人观看。
src: More than 20 million people watched Thursday's gripping testimony by Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh and the woman who accused him of a sexual assault that allegedly occurred in the 1980s, Christine Blasey Ford, on six television networks.

ref: 与此同时，政治僵局仍在继续，广播公司打乱了周五最后转折的常规节目：亚利桑那州参议员杰夫·弗莱克 (Jeff Flake) 答应会要求 FBI 对指控进行为期一周的调查。
src: Meanwhile, the political standoff continued, with broadcasters interrupting regular programming for Friday's last-minute twist: an agreement engineered by Arizona Sen. Jeff Flake for the FBI to conduct a one-week investigation of the charges.

ref: 福特向参议院司法委员会介绍称，自己百分百肯定卡瓦诺在高中派对上喝醉后，摸自己的身体，想脱掉她的衣服。
src: Ford told the Senate Judiciary Committee that she's 100 percent certain that Kavanaugh groped her drunkenly and tried to take off her clothes at a high school party.

ref: 卡瓦诺则慷慨激昂地回应称，他百分百肯定没有发生过这种情事。
src: Kavanaugh, in impassioned testimony, said he's 100 percent certain that it didn't happen.

ref: 尼尔森公司上周五报道，可能会有超过 2040 万人观看这场听证会。
src: It's likely that more than the 20.4 million people reported by Nielsen on Friday watched it.

ref: 该公司正在计算 CBS、ABC、NBC、CNN、福克斯新闻频道和、MSNBC、的平均收视率。
src: The company was counting average viewership on CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News Channel and MSNBC.

ref: 其他同时播出了这场听证会情况的网络的收视数据尚未获得，包括 PBS、C-SPAN 和 Fox Business Network。
src: Figures weren't immediately available for other networks that showed it, including PBS, C-SPAN and the Fox Business Network.

ref: 尼尔森公司在统计办公室观看节目人数方面，时常会遇到一些麻烦。
src: And Nielsen usually has some trouble measuring people who watch in offices.

ref: 客观来看，这个数字好比季后赛足球比赛或奥斯卡奖的观众规模。
src: To put that in perspective, that's an audience size similar to that for a playoff football game or the Academy Awards.

ref: 尼尔森表示，福克斯新闻频道在听证会当天的全天收视人数达 569 万，力压其他网络媒体。福克斯新闻频道的观点主持人是任命卡瓦诺的有力支持者。
src: Fox News Channel, whose opinion hosts have strongly backed Kavanaugh's appointment, led all networks with an average of 5.69 million viewers during the all-day hearing, Nielsen said.

ref: ABC 位居其后，收视人数为 326 万。
src: ABC was second with 3.26 million viewers.

ref: 尼尔森统计，CBS 的收视人数为 310 万，NBC 为 294 万，MSNBC 为 289 万，CNN 为 252 万。
src: CBS had 3.1 million, NBC had 2.94 million, MSNBC had 2.89 million and CNN had 2.52 million, Nielsen said.

ref: 听证会结束后，关注度仍居高不下。
src: Interest remained high after the hearing.

ref: 弗莱克 成为了周五节目的核心人物。
src: Flake was the central figure in Friday's drama.

ref: 先前，这位温和的共和党人，在办公室发表声明表示他将投票支持卡瓦诺。周五早上，他在登上电梯前往司法委员会听证会时，被 CNN 和 CBS 的摄像机拍摄到，抗议者对其开口大骂。
src: After the moderate Republican's office issued a statement that he would be voting in favor of Kavanaugh, he was caught be CNN and CBS cameras Friday morning being shouted at by protesters as he tried to ride an elevator to a Judiciary Committee hearing.

ref: CNN 现场直播中看到，他在被谴责期间，目光低垂，沉默不语地站了几分钟。
src: He stood with eyes downcast for several minutes as he was berated, televised live on CNN.

ref: 一位女人说道：“我就正在你的面前。”
src: "I'm standing right here in front of you," one woman said.

ref: “你觉得他对国人所说的是事实吗？”
src: "Do you think he's telling the truth to the country?

ref: “你大权在握，而这么多的女性却无能为力。”
src: He was told, "you have power when so many women are powerless.""

ref: 在电梯关闭之前，弗莱克称，他的办公室发表了一份声明，自己将在委员会听证会上发表更多言论。
src: Flake said that his office had issued a statement and said, before the elevator closed, that he would have more to say at the committee hearing.

ref: 有线电视和广播网络都在直播后续的情况，司法委员会将投票将卡瓦诺的提名，送往参议院进行全体投票。
src: The cable and broadcast networks were all covering live hours later, when the Judiciary Committee was to vote to advance Kavanaugh's nomination to the full Senate for a vote.

ref: 但弗莱克表示，只有 FBI 在下周对涉及该候选人性侵的指控做进一步调查的情况下，他才会举行投票。而少数民主党也人一直在敦促对其进行进一步调查。
src: But Flake said he would only do so with the understanding that the FBI would look into the allegations against the nominee for the next week, which minority Democrats have been urging.

ref: 在与朋友民主党参议员克里斯·库恩 (Chris Coons) 的对话后，弗拉克在一定程度上对此深信不疑。
src: Flake was convinced in part by conversations with his friend, Democratic Sen. Chris Coons.

ref: 在与库恩和几位参议员的对话后，弗拉克作出了决定。
src: After a conversation with Coons and several senators afterwards, Flake made his decision.

ref: 弗莱克的选择力度很大，因为显然，如果不进行调查，共和党人是不会投选票批准卡瓦诺的。
src: Flake's choice had power, because it was evident Republicans would not have the votes to approve Kavanaugh without the investigation.

ref: 特朗普已经向联邦调查局签发命令对卡瓦诺法官进行补充调查。
src: President Trump has opened an FBI investigation into the allegations against Kavanaugh.

ref: 英国首相特雷莎·梅指责脱欧问题的评论家们“玩政治游戏”
src: British PM May accuses critics of 'playing politics' over Brexit

ref: 英国首相特雷莎·梅 (Theresa May) 在接受《星期日泰晤士报》采访时，指责其脱欧计划的评论家们对英国的未来“玩政治游戏”，损害国家利益。
src: Prime Minister Theresa May accused critics of her plans to leave the European Union of "playing politics" with Britain's future and undermining the national interest in an interview with the Sunday Times newspaper.

ref: 英国首相特蕾莎·梅于 2018 年 9 月 29 日抵达英国伯明翰参加保守党会议。
src: Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May arrives for the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham, Britain, September 29, 2018.

ref: 在该报头版的另一则采访中，前英国外交大臣鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 对其所谓的脱欧契克斯计划进行了强烈抨击，并表示，英国和欧盟应该彼此向对方征收关税的这一提议“实属荒谬”。
src: In another interview next to the one with her on the newspaper's front page, her former foreign minister Boris Johnson pressed his attack of her so-called Chequers plan for Brexit, saying a proposal that Britain and the EU should collect each other's tariffs was "entirely preposterous."

ref: Wayde Sims 枪杀案：警方抓捕路易斯安那州立大学球员枪杀案嫌疑人 Dyteon Simpson
src: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson in LSU player's death

ref: 警方已经路易斯安那州立大学 20 岁的篮球运动员 Wayde Sims 枪杀案嫌疑人抓捕归案。
src: Police have arrested a suspect in the fatal shooting death of Wayde Sims, a 20-year-old basketball player at LSU.

ref: 巴吞鲁日警察局 (Baton Rouge Police Department) 称，20 岁的 Dyteon Simpson 因二级谋杀罪被捕入狱。
src: Dyteon Simpson, 20, has been arrested and booked into prison on a second-degree murder charge, the Baton Rouge Police Department said.

ref: 警方发布了 Sims 与 Simpson 两人打斗的视频，警方称 Sims 在打斗中，甩丢了眼镜。
src: Officials released video of the confrontation between Sims and Simpson, and police said Sims lost his glasses during the fight.

ref: CBS 附属机构 WAFB 报道称，警方在现场找到了这副眼镜，称在上面找到了 Simpson 的 DNA。
src: Police recovered the glasses from the scene and said they found Simpson's DNA on them, CBS affiliate WAFB reports.

ref: 在审问 Simpson 后，警方称 Simpson 对射杀了 Wayde 一事供认不讳。
src: After questioning Simpson, police said he admitted to fatally shooting Wayde.

ref: Advocate 报道称，其身价可达 350,000 美元。
src: His bond has been set at $350,000, the Advocate reports.

ref: East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office （东巴吞鲁日县验尸管理局）周五发布了一份初步报告，称死亡原因为头部受到的枪伤。
src: The East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office released a preliminary report Friday, saying the cause of death is a gunshot wound to the head into the neck.

ref: 警局向协助调查，最终成功逮捕逃犯的路易斯安那州警局逃犯特遣部队 (Louisiana State Police fugitive task force)、州警察犯罪实验室、南方大学警局和地区公民表示感谢。
src: The department is crediting the Louisiana State Police fugitive task force, the state police crime lab, Southern University police and area citizens in assisting in the investigation leading to the arrest.

ref: 路易斯安那州立大学体育指导员 Joe Alleva 向地区执法部门表示了感谢，赞扬该部门“工作勤勉，正义凛然”。
src: LSU athletic director Joe Alleva thanked area law enforcement for its "diligence and pursuit of justice."

ref: Sims 享年 20 岁。
src: Sims was 20 years old.

ref: Sims 身高 6 英尺 6 英寸（1.98 米），担任前锋，在巴吞鲁日长大，他的父亲 Wayne 也曾是路易斯安那州立大学篮球队的一员。
src: The 6-foot-6 forward grew up in Baton Rouge, where his father, Wayne, also played basketball for LSU.

ref: 上个赛季，他场均得到 5.6 分，2.6 个篮板。
src: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds a game last season.

ref: 周五早上，路易斯安那州立大学篮球队主教练 Will Wade 表示，球队对 Wayde 的离世，“伤心不已”，“难以接受”。
src: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team is "devastated" and "in shock" by Wayde's death.

ref: Wade 称，“这是我们最不愿意看到的结局。“
src: "This is what you worry about at all times," Wade said.

ref: 墨西哥城火山喷发
src: Volcano spews ash on Mexico City

ref: 波波卡特佩特火山爆发，喷出的灰烬弥漫到了墨西哥首都南部的街区。
src: Ash spewing from the Popocatepetl volcano has reached the southern neighborhoods of Mexico's capital.

ref: 墨西哥全国防灾中心周六 24 小时内记录冒烟 183 次，随后向墨西哥人民发出警告，在火山口活动后，远离火山。
src: The National Center for Disaster Prevention warned Mexicans on Saturday to stay away from the volcano after activity picked up in the crater and it registered 183 emissions of gas and ash over 24 hours.

ref: 防灾中心对多次发出的隆隆声和轻微地震进行监测。
src: The center was monitoring multiple rumblings and tremors.

ref: 社交媒体上的图片显示，墨西哥城附近的霍奇米尔科，汽车挡风玻璃上蒙上了一层灰烬。
src: Images on social media showed thin layers of ash coating car windshields in neighborhoods of Mexico City such as Xochimilco.

ref: 地球物理学家注意到，自 2017 年 9 月在墨西哥中部发生的 7.1 级地震以来，位于首都东南 45 英里（72 公里）的火山活动增加。
src: Geophysicists have noticed an increase in activity at the volcano that sits 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital since a 7.1-magnitude earthquake rocked central Mexico in September 2017.

ref: 这座火山又称“烟峰”，自 1994 年开始进入活动期。
src: The volcano known as "Don Goyo" has been active since 1994.

ref: 加泰罗尼亚独立公投周年纪念前夕，警方与分离主义者发生冲突
src: Police clash with Catalan separatists ahead of independence vote anniversary

ref: 周六，数千人加入反示威游行，以纪念加泰罗尼亚两极化分裂公投一周年，支持独立的抗议者们与防暴警察发生冲突，随后六人在巴塞罗那被捕。
src: Six people were arrested in Barcelona on Saturday after pro-independence protesters clashed with riot police, and as thousands joined rival demonstrations to mark the first anniversary of Catalonia's polarizing vote on secession.

ref: 一群蒙面的支持分离主义者向防暴警察投掷鸡蛋和粉末涂料，导致往日挤满游客的街道上尘土遮天，随后被防暴警察拦下。
src: A group of masked pro-separatists held back by riot police pelted them with eggs and hurled powder paint, creating dark clouds of dust in streets that would usually be thronged with tourists.

ref: 当天晚些时候还发生了混战，警察用警棍遏制了这场动乱。
src: Scuffles also broke out later in the day with police using their batons to contain the fighting.

ref: 高呼“决不忘记，决不原谅”的支持独立派，与高呼“西班牙万岁”的主张统一的抗议者们对峙长达数小时。
src: Over several hours pro-independence groups chanting "No forgetting, no forgiveness" faced off with unionist protesters shouting, "Long live Spain."

ref: 据当地媒体报道，有十四人因在抗议活动中受轻伤而接受治疗。
src: Fourteen people received treatment for minor injuries received in the protests, local press reported.

ref: 去年 10 月 1 日的公投在马德里被视为非法行为，一年后，在这个倾向独立的地区，局势依然高度紧张，但加泰罗尼亚分离主义者却在举行庆祝活动。
src: Tensions remain high in the independence-minded region a year after the October 1 referendum deemed illegal by Madrid but celebrated by separatist Catalans.

ref: 绝大多数选民选择独立，尽管如此，投票率依然很低，因为大多数反对分裂的人士拒绝投票。
src: Voters chose overwhelmingly to become independent, though turnout was low with those against secession largely boycotting the vote.

ref: 据加泰罗尼亚当局表示，去年警方试图阻止该地区各投票站相继进行的投票，引发剧烈冲突，导致近 1000 人受伤。
src: According to Catalan authorities almost 1000 people were injured last year after police tried to stop the vote going ahead at polling stations across the region in violent clashes.

ref: 周五晚上，支持独立派集体露营，阻止示威游行，支持国家警察的行动。
src: Pro-independence groups had camped out overnight on Friday to prevent a demonstration in support of the national police.

ref: 示威游行仍在继续，但却不得不采取其他途径。
src: The demonstration went ahead but was forced to take a different route.

ref: 与妻子一同参加此次分离主义者抗议活动的纳尔奇斯·特梅斯 (Narcis Termes)，是一名 68 岁的电工，他表示对加泰罗尼亚获得独立不再抱有任何希望。
src: Narcis Termes, 68, an electrician attending the separatist protest with his wife said he was no longer hopeful about the prospects of Catalonia gaining independence.

ref: “去年，我们经历了人生中最美好的一段时光。
src: "Last year we lived through one of our best moments.

ref: 我的父母因为能够参与投票而高兴得哭了，但现在我们却陷入了困境”，他说到。
src: I watched my parents cry with joy at being able to vote but now we are stuck," he said.

ref: 尽管在去年 12 月的地区选举中取得了至关重要的险胜，但是今年加泰罗尼亚支持独立派仍试图保持其势头，其中多位最著名的领袖或自我流放，或因在组织公投以及随后宣布独立期间出头露面而遭拘留候审。
src: Despite managing a vital if narrow victory in regional elections last December, Catalan pro-independence parties have struggled to retain momentum this year with many of their best known leaders either in self imposed exile or in detention awaiting trial for their role in organizing the referendum and subsequent declaration of independence.

ref: 42 岁的机修工琼普格 (Joan Puig) 用手机记录下了抗议活动，以为警方提供支持，他说，这场冲突是由双方的政客们煽动起来的。
src: Joan Puig, a 42-year-old mechanic recording the protest in support of the police on his phone, said the conflict had been stoked by politicians on both sides.

ref: “局势越来越紧张”，他表示。
src: "It's getting more and more tense," he said.

ref: 周六，自去年年末一直关押在预审监狱中的九位加泰罗尼亚领导人之一的奥里奥尔·洪克拉斯 (Oriol Junqueras)，宣布将参加明年的欧洲议会选举。
src: On Saturday, Oriol Junqueras, one of nine Catalan leaders in pre-trial jail since late last year, announced he would run in European Parliament elections next year.

ref: “作为欧洲议会选举的候选人，公开谴责西班牙政府在民主观念和镇压方面的倒退，这将是最有利的方式”，他说到。
src: "Standing as a candidate for the European elections is the best way to denounce the regression in democratic values and repression we have seen from the Spanish government," he said.

ref: 伦敦德里郡：三名男子开车撞毁房屋被捕
src: Londonderry: Men arrested after house rammed by car

ref: 三名作案男子（年龄分别为 33 岁、34 岁、39 岁）驾驶汽车多次撞向伦敦德里郡的一所房屋，事发后，被警方逮捕。
src: Three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, have been arrested after a car was repeatedly rammed into a house in Londonderry.

ref: 案发时间为周四 19:30 左右，案发地点为 Ballynagard Crescent。
src: The incident unfolded in Ballynagard Crescent on Thursday at about 19:30 BST.

ref: 高级警官 Bob Blemmings 介绍称，撞击对大门和建筑本身造成了破坏。
src: Det Insp Bob Blemmings said damage was caused to the gates and the building itself.

ref: 某种情况下，可能已向汽车放弩进行干预。
src: A crossbow may also have been fired at the car at some point.

ref: 蒙加的进球助力利文斯顿队以 1-0 战胜流浪者队
src: Menga strike gives Livingston 1-0 win over Rangers

ref: 多利·蒙加 (Dolly Menga) 的首球为利文斯顿球队 (Livingston) 赢得了胜利
src: Dolly Menga's first goal for Livingston secured victory

ref: 利文斯顿队的晋位震惊了流浪者队，史蒂文·杰拉德 (Steven Gerrard) 在 18 场比赛中,第二次输掉了比赛。
src: Promoted Livingston stunned Rangers to consign Steven Gerrard to just his second defeat in 18 games as manager of the Ibrox club.

ref: 多利·蒙加 (Dolly Menga) 的进球成了关键决胜之球，加里·霍尔特 (Gary Holt) 的球队在第二节追平了爱尔兰队 (Hibernian)。
src: Dolly Menga's strike proved to be the difference as Gary Holt's side moved level with Hibernian in second.

ref: 杰拉德的球队本赛季仍然没有客场获胜，他们将在下周日迎战领先其 8 分领跑者红心队。
src: Gerrard's side remain without an away win in the Premiership this season and face leaders Hearts, who they trail by eight points, next Sunday.

ref: 在此之前，流浪者队 (Rangers) 将于周四在欧洲联赛中 Rapid Vienna 队。在此之前，流浪者队将在周四的欧罗巴联赛中主场迎战维也纳快攻队 (Rapid Vienna)。
src: Before then, Rangers host Rapid Vienna in the Europa League on Thursday.

ref: 与此同时，利文斯顿球队将继续其在本赛区第六场不败纪录，自从上个月接替肯尼·米勒 (Kenny Miler) 之后，主教练霍尔特未尝到失败的滋味。
src: Livingston, meanwhile, extend their unbeaten run in the division to six games, with head coach Holt still to taste defeat since replacing Kenny Miler last month.

ref: 利文斯顿队很是怀念与强敌客队对抗的机会
src: Livingston miss chances against blunt visitors

ref: 霍尔特的球队在得分之前就已经有了领先的迹象，他们的进攻给流浪者带来了各种各样的问题。
src: Holt's team should have been ahead long before they scored, with their directness causing Rangers all manner of problems.

ref: 斯科特·罗宾逊 (Scott Robinson) 虽然突破了防守，却将球踢到了球门的另一边，阿兰·利思戈 (Alan Lithgow) 在接到克雷格·哈尔科特 (Craig Halkett) 的头球后，被拖到了边路。
src: Scott Robinson broke through but dragged his effort across the face of goal, then Alan Lithgow could only direct his effort wide after sliding in to meet Craig Halkett's header across goal.

ref: 东道主非常愿意与流浪者队比赛，因为他们知道可以在定位球时，给客队制造麻烦。
src: The hosts were content to let Rangers play in front of them, knowing they could trouble the visitors at set pieces.

ref: 关键性的射门就是这样产生的。
src: And that was the manner in which the crucial goal came.

ref: 游骑兵队丢了一个任意球，利文斯顿队开了一个空位，德克兰加拉格尔和罗宾逊一起组建了蒙加，后者从禁区中心接过一记得分。流浪者队丢了一个任意球，利文斯顿队破门，德克兰·加拉格尔 (Declan Gallagher) 和罗宾逊联手围堵蒙加。蒙加在禁区中央触球得分。
src: Rangers conceded a free-kick and Livingston worked an opening, Declan Gallagher and Robinson combining to set up Menga, who took a touch and scored from the centre of the box.

ref: 这时，流浪者队虽然掌握了控球权，却发现主队防守难以突破，守门员利亚姆凯利 (Liam Kelly) 基本上没什么可担忧的，
src: By that stage, Rangers had dominated possession but had found the home defence impenetrable and goalkeeper Liam Kelly was largely untroubled,

ref: 这种模式一直持续到下半场，尽管阿尔弗雷多·莫雷洛斯 (Alfredo Morelos) 从凯利脚下抢到了一球。
src: That pattern continued into the second half, though Alfredo Morelos did force a save from Kelly.

ref: 斯科特·皮特曼 (Scott Pittman) 被流浪者队门将阿兰·麦格雷戈 (Allan McGregor) 一脚挡出，利思戈将利文斯顿队的另一个定位球踢偏。
src: Scott Pittman was denied by the feet of Rangers goalkeeper Allan McGregor and Lithgow flicked wide from another Livingston set play.

ref: Crosses 不断进入利文斯顿队的禁区，并不断地被解围，而两个点球——在哈尔科特提出要让替补格伦·米德尔顿 (Glenn Middleton) 上场和一个手球之后——被踢了回去。
src: Crosses continually came into the Livingston box and were continually cleared, while two penalty claims - after Halkett's challenge on substitute Glenn Middleton, and one for handball - were waved away.

ref: 利文斯顿队“超凡表现”分析
src: 'Phenomenal' from Livingston - analysis

ref: BBC 苏格兰记者阿拉斯代尔·拉蒙特 (Alasdair Lamont) 在Tony Macaroni Arena 报道
src: BBC Scotland's Alasdair Lamont at the Tony Macaroni Arena

ref: 利文斯顿队表现超凡，成绩惊人。
src: A phenomenal performance and result for Livingston.

ref: 全体球员的表现都十分优秀，再一次超越了人们的期望。
src: To a man, they were excellent, continuing to exceed expectations on this upward trajectory.

ref: 自从霍尔特重返顶级联赛以来，这支球队的比赛风格和人员配置几乎没有什么变化，但霍尔特给球队带来的荣誉确实值得称道。
src: Their style of play and personnel has scarcely changed since their return to the top flight, but great credit has to go to Holt for the way he has galvanised the team since his arrival.

ref: 他带出了很多英雄般的球员。
src: He had so many heroes.

ref: 队长哈尔科特功不可没，他部署了组织性超强的防守阵容，而蒙加在整个过程中，让康纳·戈德森 (Connor Goldson) 和乔·沃拉尔 (Joe Worrall) 未曾放下过提防。
src: Captain Halkett was immense, marshalling a superbly-organised defence, while Menga kept Connor Goldson and Joe Worrall on their toes throughout.

ref: 不过，流浪者队的士气不够足。
src: Rangers were short of inspiration, though.

ref: 他们在杰拉德的带领下，偶尔表现尚佳，但远没有达到标准。
src: As good as they have been at times under Gerrard, they fell well short of those standards.

ref: 他们的最后一球没有踢进——他们只切入了主队一次——这对处于中游的流浪者队来说，可谓一个警钟。
src: Their final ball was lacking - only once did they cut the home side open - and it is something of a wake-up call for Rangers, who find themselves in mid-table.

ref: 埃尔多安在科隆喜忧参半
src: Erdogan get mixed reception in Cologne

ref: 周六（9 月 29 日），也就是土耳其总统来德国进行国事访问的最后一天，一片万里晴空，两国领导人在柏林举行了一场友好的早餐会。
src: There were smiles and blue skies on Saturday (September 29) as the leaders of Turkey and Germany met for breakast in Berlin.

ref: 埃尔多安总统的此次德国之行颇受争议，这次访问旨在修复这两个北约盟国之间的关系。
src: It's the last day of President Erdogan's controversial visit to Germany - which is aimed at repairing relations beteen the NATO allies.

ref: 他们在人权、新闻自由和土耳其加入欧盟等问题上而陷入僵持。
src: They've fallen out over issues including human rights, press freedom and Turkey's accession to the EU.

ref: 随后，埃尔多安前往在科隆新落成的一座巨大的清真寺。
src: Erdogan then headed for Cologne to open a giant new mosque.

ref: 科隆这个城市的土耳其人口众多，是土耳其国家以外，土耳其人口最多的城市。
src: The city is home to the largest Turkish population outside Turkey.

ref: 警方以安全为由，阻止了 25,000 名观众前往该清真寺参加集会，但附近还是出现了很多支持者，欢迎总统的到来。
src: Police cited security reasons to block a 25,000-strong crowd from gathering in front of the mosque, but plenty of supporters turned out nearby to see their president.

ref: 数百名反对埃尔多安的抗议者（其中很多人都属于库尔德人）也发出了发对的声音，谴责埃尔多安的政策，谴责德国政府不该欢迎埃尔多安来德国访问。
src: Hundreds of anti-Erdogan protesters - many of them Kurdish - also made their voices heard, condemning both Erdogan's policies and the German government's decision to welcome him to the country.

ref: 两方抗议活动反映出的是对埃尔多安来访问题上产生的分歧：一部分德国土耳其人称其为英雄，另一部分人则谴责其为独裁者。
src: The dueling protests reflect the divisiveness of a visitor hailed as a hero by some German Turks and reviled as an autocrat by others.

ref: 德特福德道路交通事故：单车车主与汽车相撞后死亡
src: Deptford road crash: Cyclist dies in collision with car

ref: 一名单车车主在伦敦的一起撞车事故中死亡。
src: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.

ref: 事故发生的时间大约为英国夏令时上午 10:15，事故地点为 Bestwood Street 和 Evelyn Street 的交界处附近，这里是该市东南部的德特福德 (Deptford) 的一条繁忙的路段。
src: The crash happened near the junction of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street, a busy road in Deptford, in the south-east of the city, at about 10:15 BST.

ref: 汽车司机停车查看，医护人员实施了救援，但单车车主已当场死亡。
src: The driver of the car stopped and paramedics attended, but the man died at the scene.

ref: 就在这场事故发生的几个月之前，距离周六这起撞车事件大约一英里左右的奇尔德斯街 (Childers Street) 上，另一名单车车主在一起肇事逃逸撞车事件中不幸身亡。
src: The crash comes months after another cyclist died in a hit-and-run on Childers Street, about a mile away from Saturday's crash.

ref: 伦敦大都会区警局 (Metropolitan Police) 称，警方正在确定该男子的身份，然后会向其直系亲属通知此事。
src: The Metropolitan Police said officers were working to identify the man and inform his next-of-kin.

ref: 目前已封闭道路，做好了公共汽车改道工作，建议驾驶者绕开这一地区而行。
src: Road closures and bus diversions are in place and motorists have been advised to avoid the area.

ref: Long Lartin 监狱：骚乱致六名狱警受伤
src: Long Lartin prison: Six officers hurt in disorder

ref: 监狱办公室表示，一座高设防的男子监狱发生暴乱，六名狱警在骚乱中受伤。
src: Six prison officers have been injured in a disturbance at a high security men's jail, the Prison Office has said.

ref: 英国夏令时周日早上 9 点 30 分，伍斯特郡的 HMP Long Lartin 监狱爆发骚乱，并且骚乱仍在进行中。
src: Disorder broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire at about 09:30 BST on Sunday and is ongoing.

ref: 相关部门派出专门的旋风突击队到场处理，暴乱涉及八名囚犯，目前已将所有牵涉人员控制于一座楼房。
src: Specialist "Tornado" officers have been brought in to deal with the disturbance, which involves eight inmates and is contained to one wing.

ref: 狱警面部受到轻伤，接受现场治疗。
src: The officers were treated for minor facial injuries at the scene.

ref: 监狱管理局发言人介绍道：“已经部署了专门应付监狱暴乱的工作人员去处理 HMP Long Lartin 正在继续的暴乱。
src: A Prison Service spokesperson said: "Specially trained prison staff have been deployed to deal with an ongoing incident at HMP Long Lartin.

ref: 六名受伤狱警已接受了治疗。
src: Six members of staff have been treated for injuries.

ref: 我们绝不容忍监狱中有任何暴力行为，并且，我们会将始作俑者移交给给警方，这些作乱人员可能面临更长的监禁。”
src: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons, and are clear that those responsible will be referred to the police and could spend longer behind bars."

ref: HMP Long Lartin 监狱有 500 多名囚犯，其中包括英国一些最危险的罪犯。
src: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the country's most dangerous offenders.

ref: 据报道，6 月份，这所监狱的监狱长遭到囚犯袭击，后送往医院治疗。
src: In June it was reported that the prison's governor received hospital treatment after being attacked by a prisoner.

ref: 去年 10 月，动用了防暴警察，前往这所监狱处理重大骚乱，遭到台球袭击。
src: And in October last year riot officers were called to the prison to deal with a serious disturbance in which staff were attacked with pool balls.

ref: 飓风罗莎 (Rosa) 对凤凰城、拉斯维加斯、盐湖城造成洪水威胁（干旱地区可能会因此而受益）
src: Hurricane Rosa Threatening Phoenix, Las Vegas, Salt Lake City With Flash Flooding (Drought Areas May Benefit)

ref: 热带低气压袭击亚利桑那州的事件十分罕见，但这一情况很可能在下周早些时候发生，因为飓风罗莎 (Rosa) 的残余力量将袭击西南部沙漠地区，从而引发洪水危险。
src: It's rare for a tropical depression to hit Arizona, but that's exactly what's likely to happen early happen early next week as Hurricane Rosa's remaining energy tracks across the Desert Southwest, delivering flash flooding risks.

ref: 国家气象局已经针对周一和周二，向亚利桑那州西部至内华达州南部和东部、加利福尼亚州东南部和犹他州（包括凤凰城、弗拉格斯塔夫、拉斯维加斯和盐湖城）等地区发布了洪水预警。
src: The National Weather Service has already issued flash flood watches for Monday and Tuesday for western Arizona into southern and eastern Nevada, southeastern California and Utah, including the cities of Phoenix, Flagstaff, Las Vegas, and Salt Lake City.

ref: 罗莎预计于周一晚些时候携降雨到达，于周二在凤凰城上方过境。
src: Rosa is expected to take a direct path over Phoenix on Tuesday, approaching late Monday with rain.

ref: 驻凤凰城国家气象局在推特上写道，“自 1950 年以来，只有十个热带气旋在距离凤凰城 200 英里以内，仍保持着热带风暴或低气压状态！
src: The National Weather Service in Phoenix noted in a tweet that only "ten tropical cyclones have maintained tropical storm or depression status within 200 miles of Phoenix since 1950!

ref: 卡特里娜 (Katrina) (1967) 是一场从亚利桑那州边境 40 英里以内登陆的飓风”。
src: Katrina (1967) was a hurricane within 40 miles of the AZ border."

ref: 根据最新的国家飓风中心 (National Hurricane Cente) 模型预测，降雨量将达到 2 到 4 英寸，亚利桑那州莫戈隆边缘的局部降雨量将达到 6 英寸。
src: The latest National Hurricane Center models predict 2 to 4 inches of rainfall, with isolated amounts up to 6 inches in the Mogollon Rim of Arizona.

ref: 包括落基山脉中部和大盆地在内的其他西南部沙漠地区降雨量很可能达到 1 到 2 英寸，局部总降雨量有可能达到 4 英寸。
src: Other areas of the Desert Southwest including the central Rockies and the Great Basin are likely to get 1 to 2 inches, with isolated totals up to 4 inches possible.

ref: 对于不会引发洪水危险的地区，由于这些地区旱情严重，因此罗莎带来的降水可能是一件幸事。
src: For those out of flash flood risk, Rosa's rain may be a blessing since the region is drought-stricken.

ref: 虽然洪水引发高度重视，但适量降雨也可能是有益的，因为西南部地区目前正经历着干旱。
src: Although flooding is a very serious concern, some of this rainfall will likely be beneficial since the Southwest is currently experiencing drought conditions.

ref: 据 weather.com 报道，美国干旱监测周报 (U.S. Drought Monitor) 显示，亚利桑那州 40% 以上的地区正经历着至少极端干旱条件（第二严重的类别）。
src: According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, just over 40 percent of Arizona is experiencing at least extreme drought, the second highest category," weather.com reported.

ref: 首先，飓风罗莎的路径将致使其登陆墨西哥的下加利福尼亚半岛。
src: First, Hurricane Rosa's path leads to landfall across the Baja California peninsula of Mexico.

ref: 周日早上，罗莎仍处于飓风强度，最大风力为每小时 85 英里，位于墨西哥尤金尼亚角以南 385 英里处，正以每小时 12 英里的速度向北移动。
src: Rosa, still at hurricane strength Sunday morning with maximum winds of 85 miles per hour, is 385 miles south of Punta Eugenia, Mexico and moving north at 12 miles per hour.

ref: 飓风接触了太平上凉爽的海水，因而风力减弱。
src: The storm is encountering cooler waters in the Pacific and therefore powering down.

ref: 因此，预计将于周一下午或晚上以热带风暴的强度从墨西哥登陆。
src: Thus, it's expected to make landfall in Mexico at tropical storm strength in the afternoon or evening on Monday.

ref: 墨西哥部分地区的降雨量可能会很大，存在引发洪水的危险。
src: Rainfall across portions of Mexico could be heavy, posing a significant flooding risk.

ref: 据 weather.com 报道，“预计从下加利福尼亚半岛至索诺拉州西北部的总降雨量将达到 3 到 6 英寸，甚至可能达到 10 英寸”。
src: "Rainfall totals of 3 to 6 inches are expected from Baja California into northwestern Sonora, with up to 10 inches possible," weather.com reported.

ref: 随后，罗莎将以热带风暴的形式向北穿越墨西哥，于周二凌晨以热带低气压的形式抵达亚利桑那州边境，并于周二深夜穿过整个亚利桑那州，进入犹他州南部。
src: Rosa will then track north across Mexico as a tropical storm before reaching the Arizona border in the early morning hours Tuesday as a tropical depression, which will then track up through Arizona and into southern Utah by late Tuesday night.

ref: 国家飓风中心表示“预计罗莎或其残余力量的主要危害将是，为下加利福尼亚半岛、索诺拉州西北部和美国西南部沙漠地区带来强降雨”。
src: "The main hazard expected from Rosa or its remnants is very heavy rainfall in Baja California, northwestern Sonora, and the U.S. Desert Southwest," the National Hurricane Center said.

ref: 预计此番降雨将在沙漠地区引发危及生命的洪水和泥石流，并在山区地带引发山体滑坡。
src: These rains are expected to produce life-threatening flash flooding and debris flows in the deserts, and landslides in mountainous terrain.

ref: Midsomer Norton 袭击事件：四名蓄意谋杀嫌疑犯获捕
src: Midsomer Norton attack: Four attempted murder arrests

ref: 一名 16 岁的男孩在萨默塞特身上，发现多处刺伤，随后，犯罪嫌疑人涉嫌蓄意谋杀被捕。犯罪嫌疑人系为三名十几岁的男孩，和一名二十岁的男子。
src: Three teenage boys and a 20-year-old man have been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a 16-year-old was found with stab wounds in Somerset.

ref: 被害的十几岁男孩于星期六凌晨 4 点左右，在诺顿 (Midsomer Norton) 的 Excelsior Terrace 地区被发现受伤，
src: The teenage boy was found injured in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton, at about 04:00 BST on Saturday.

ref: 随后被送往医院，目前伤势“稳定”。
src: He was taken to hospital where he remains in a "stable" condition.

ref: 埃文萨默塞特警局 (Avon and Somerset Police) 称，已于拉德斯托克 (Radstock) 地区将犯罪嫌疑人（其中，有 17 岁男子一名、18 岁男子两名，20 岁男子一名）连夜抓捕归案。
src: A 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area, Avon and Somerset Police said.

ref: 警方呼吁用手机抓拍到现场视频的目击者踊跃提供线索。
src: Officers have appealed for anyone who may have any mobile phone footage of what happened to come forward.

ref: 特朗普称卡瓦诺是民主党“卑鄙愤怒的承受者"
src: Trump says Kavanaugh 'suffered, the meanness, the anger' of the Democratic Party

ref: 特朗普在西弗吉尼亚州惠灵的一次集会上称：“投卡瓦诺法官一票，就是对民主党无情和无耻战术所投的反对票。”
src: "A vote for Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to reject the ruthless and outrageous tactics of the Democratic Party," Trump said at a rally in Wheeling, West Virginia.

ref: 特朗普称，卡瓦诺在整个提名过程中“遭受了民主党的卑鄙和愤怒”。
src: Trump said that Kavanaugh has "suffered the meanness, the anger" of the Democratic Party throughout his nomination process.

ref: 卡瓦诺周四在接受国会审问时，情绪激动地强烈否认克里斯汀·布莱西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 对其提出的指控，称几十年前，年少的他未曾性侵过福特。
src: Kavanaugh testified before Congress on Thursday, forcefully and emotionally denying an allegation from Christine Blasey Ford that he sexually assaulted her decades ago when they were teenagers.

ref: 福特也就其指控出席听证会。
src: Ford also testified at the hearing about her allegation.

ref: 总统周六表示，那天“美国人民看到了卡瓦诺的过人正气和勇气”。
src: The President said on Saturday that the "American people saw the brilliant and quality and courage" of Kavanaugh that day.

ref: 总统对西弗吉尼亚州的支持者说道，“投票支持卡瓦诺法官，就是投票认可我们这个时代最有成就的法律智者，一名公共服务有口皆碑的法学家”。
src: "A vote to confirm Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to confirm one of the most accomplished legal minds of our time, a jurist with a sterling record of public service," he told the crowd of West Virginia supporters.

ref: 总统在谈到共和党选情在中期选举中的重要性时，间接影射了卡瓦诺的提名。
src: The President obliquely referred to Kavanaugh's nomination while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.

ref: ”距离我们一生中最重要的一次选举，还有五周的时间。
src: "Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.

ref: “我不是在竞选，我这样四处奔波，
src: I'm not running, but I'm really running," he said.

ref: 就是为了能让你们选出优秀的候选人”，他说道。
src: "That's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates."

ref: 特朗普称，民主党肩负的使命就是“抵抗和阻挠”。
src: Trump argued that Democrats are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."

ref: 一名共和党高级领导助理向美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 介绍称，预计，最晚将于周五在参议院举行对卡瓦诺提名的第一次关键程序性投票。
src: The first key procedural vote on the Senate floor on Kavanaugh's nomination is expected to take place no later than Friday, a senior GOP leadership aide has told CNN.

ref: 印尼地震和海啸造成数百人死亡，目前死亡人数仍在上升
src: Hundreds killed by Indonesian quake, tsunami, with toll seen rising

ref: 印尼当局于周六表示，一场大地震和海啸袭击了印尼苏拉威西岛，造成至少 384 人死亡，多人在巨浪冲上海滩时被卷走。
src: At least 384 people were killed, many swept away as giant waves crashed onto beaches, when a major earthquake and tsunami hit the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, authorities said on Saturday.

ref: 周五傍晚，数百人正聚集在巴鲁市的海滩上参加派对，这时高达 6 米（18 英尺）的海浪冲上海岸，造成多人死亡，海啸所到之处全部面目全非。
src: Hundreds of people had gathered for a festival on the beach in the city of Palu on Friday when waves as high as six meters (18 feet) smashed onshore at dusk, sweeping many to their deaths and destroying anything in their path.

ref: 这场海啸由 7.5 级的地震引发。
src: The tsunami followed a 7.5 magnitude earthquake.

ref: 印尼减灾机构 BNPB 发言人苏托波·普沃·努格罗霍 (Sutopo Purwo Nugroho) 在雅加达的情况通报会上说道：“昨天海啸发生时，人们正在海滩上活动，没能及时逃离，因而不幸遇难”。
src: "When the tsunami threat arose yesterday, people were still doing their activities on the beach and did not immediately run and they became victims," Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, the spokesman for Indonesia's disaster mitigation agency BNPB said in a briefing in Jakarta.

ref: “海啸夹杂着汽车、木柴、房屋而来，席卷了陆地上的一切”，努格罗霍说到，又补充到，海啸以每小时 800 公里（每小时 497 英里）的速度穿过公海，然后才袭击了海岸线。
src: "The tsunami didn't come by itself, it dragged cars, logs, houses, it hit everything on land," Nugroho said, adding that the tsunami had traveled across the open sea at speeds of 800 kph (497 mph) before striking the shoreline.

ref: 有的人爬到树上躲避海啸得以幸存，他说。
src: Some people climbed trees to escape the tsunami and survived, he said.

ref: 大约 16,700 人被疏散至巴鲁的 24 个疏散中心。
src: Around 16,700 people were evacuated to 24 centers in Palu.

ref: 救灾机构发布的航拍照片显示，许多建筑和店铺被毁，桥梁扭曲、坍塌，一座清真寺被海水包围。
src: Aerial photographs released by the disaster agency showed many buildings and shops destroyed, bridges twisted and collapsed and a mosque surrounded by water.

ref: 周六，余震持续侵扰着这座沿海城市。
src: Aftershocks continued to rock the coastal city on Saturday.

ref: 这片拥有 240 万人口的区域都感受到了强烈的震感。
src: The series of earthquakes were felt in an area with 2.4 million people.

ref: 印尼技术评估与应用机构 (BPPT) 在一份声明中指出，周五的大地震所释放的威力大约是二战期间投放在广岛的原子弹的 200 倍。
src: Indonesia's Agency for the Assessment and Application of Technology (BPPT) said in statement the energy released by Friday's massive quake was around 200 times the power of the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in World War Two.

ref: 声明还指出，这座城市位于一座狭长海湾的尽头，因此地理位置有可能放大了海啸的威力。
src: The geography of the city, which sits at the end of a long, narrow bay, could have magnified the size of the tsunami, it said.

ref: 努格罗霍将损毁描述为“大规模”，并表示成千上万的房屋、医院、购物中心和酒店被摧毁。
src: Nugroho described the damage as "extensive" and said thousands of houses, hospitals, shopping malls and hotels had collapsed.

ref: 一些遇难者的尸体被压在坍塌建筑的废墟下，他说到，并补充到有 540 人受伤，29 人失踪。
src: Bodies of some victims were found trapped under the rubble of collapsed buildings, he said, adding 540 people were injured and 29 were missing.

ref: 努格罗霍表示巴鲁北部 300 公里（190 英里）海岸线沿途的伤亡和毁坏情况可能更加严重，那片区域是栋加拉，距离震中更近。
src: Nugroho said the casualties and the damage could be greater along the coastline 300 km (190 miles) north of Palu, an area called Donggala, which is closer to the epicenter of the quake.

ref: 栋加拉的通讯“完全瘫痪，没有任何消息”，努格罗霍说到。
src: Communications "were totally crippled with no information" from Donggala, Nugroho said.

ref: 红十字会声明称，那片区域有 300,000 以上的人口居住，并补充到，红十字会的工作人员和志愿者正在前往受灾区域。
src: There are more than 300,000 people living there," the Red Cross said in a statement, adding that its staff and volunteers were heading to the affected areas.

ref: “虽然这已经是一场悲剧，但情况有可能会更糟糕”，红十字会表示。
src: "This is already a tragedy, but it could get much worse," it said.

ref: 由于没有告知广大民众海啸袭击了巴鲁，该机构于周六受到了广泛的批评，尽管官员们称，海啸发生在警报发布之后。
src: The agency on Saturday was widely criticized for not informing that a tsunami had hit Palu, though officials said waves had come within the time the warning was issued.

ref: 在社交媒体上分享的一段业余爱好者拍摄的视频中，可以听到一名身处建筑上层的男子对下面街道上的人群疯狂呼喊，警告他们海啸即将来临。
src: In amateur footage shared on social media a man on the upper floor of a building can be heard shouting frantic warnings of the approaching tsunami to people on the street below.

ref: 几分钟后，水墙冲上海岸，卷走了建筑和车辆。
src: Within minutes a wall of water crashes onto the shore, carrying away buildings and cars.

ref: 路透社无法立即鉴定视频的真实性。
src: Reuters was not able to immediately authenticate the footage.

ref: 地震和海啸造成大规模停电，切断了巴鲁周围的通讯，致使政府当局无法协调救援工作。
src: The quake and tsunami caused a major power outage that cut communications around Palu making it difficult for authorities to coordinate rescue efforts.

ref: 印尼当局称，军方已经开始从雅加达和其他城市派出救援运输飞机，但是疏散人员仍然急需食物和其他基本必需品。
src: The military has started sending in cargo planes with aid from Jakarta and other cities, authorities said, but evacuees still badly need food and other basic necessities.

ref: 巴鲁市的机场目前只针对救援工作重新开放，并将在 10 月份之前处于关闭状态。
src: The city's airport has been reopened only for relief efforts and will remain closed until Oct.

ref: 总统佐科·维多多 (Joko Widodo ) 计划于周日访问巴鲁的疏散中心。
src: President Joko Widodo was scheduled to visit evacuation centers in Palu on Sunday.

ref: 印尼海啸死亡人数升至 800 人以上。
src: Indonesia Tsunami Toll Soars Above 800.

ref: 这真的非常糟糕。
src: It Is Very Bad.

ref: 虽然栋加拉世界宣明会的工作人员已经安全抵达巴鲁市，而巴鲁市的员工也暂时安置在公司院子里临时搭建的油布避难所内，但他们在途中看到的景象却惨不忍睹，Doseba 说到。
src: While World Vision's staff from Donggala have made it safely to Palu city, where employees are sheltering in tarpaulin shelters set up in the courtyard of their office, they passed scenes of devastation on the way, Mr. Doseba said.

ref: “他们说看到多处房屋被损毁”，他说。
src: "They told me they saw lots of houses that were destroyed," he said.

ref: 这真的非常糟糕。
src: It is very bad.

ref: 就在救援组织开始这场残酷的战役，启动赈灾设备的同时，一些人抱怨称，具有深厚专业知识的外籍救援人员被禁止前往巴鲁。
src: Even as aid groups began the grim motions of starting the gears of disaster relief, some complained that foreign aid workers with deep expertise were being prevented from traveling to Palu.

ref: 根据印尼法律规定，只有宣布灾难现场为国家灾难区时，才会允许海外资金、物资和工作人员的流动。
src: According to Indonesian regulations, funding, supplies and staffing from overseas can only start flowing if the site of a calamity is declared a national disaster zone.

ref: 但是尚未宣布。
src: That has not happened yet.

ref: “这仍是一场省级灾难”，印尼红十字会发言人 Aulia Arriani 说到。
src: "It's still a province level disaster," said Aulia Arriani, a spokesperson for the Indonesian Red Cross.

ref: “一旦政府表示，‘这是一场国家灾难’，我们便可以为国际救援放行，但是目前的情况尚不允许。”
src: "Once the government says, "O.K., this is a national disaster," we can open for international assistance but there's no status yet."

ref: 周五发生地震和海啸后的第二天晚上，在巴鲁，失踪人员的亲友们仍抱着一线希望，希望他们的亲人能够创造奇迹，为这场悲惨的自然灾害增添一抹色彩。
src: As the second night fell on Palu after Friday's earthquake and tsunami, friends and family of those still missing were holding out hope that their loved ones would be the miracles that leaven the bleak story lines of natural disasters.

ref: 周六，救援人员从下水道里打捞上来一名小男孩。
src: On Saturday, a little boy was plucked from a sewer.

ref: 周日，救援人员救出了一位在瓦砾下被压了两天的妇女，而她母亲的尸体就在她身旁。
src: On Sunday, rescuers freed a woman who had been pinned under rubble for two days with the body of her mother next to her.

ref: 印尼国家滑翔伞队教练 Gendon Subandono 曾对两名失踪的滑翔伞运动员进行训练，以备战本月初于印尼举行的亚运会。
src: Gendon Subandono, the coach of the Indonesian national paragliding team, had trained two of the missing paragliders for the Asian Games, which wrapped up earlier this month in Indonesia.

ref: 包括 Mandagi 在内的其他被困在 Roa Roa 酒店的人都是他的学生。
src: Others of those trapped at the Roa Roa Hotel, Mr. Mandagi included, were his students.

ref: “作为滑翔伞领域的资深运动员，我承受着个人的情感负担”，他说。
src: "As a senior in the paragliding field, I have my own emotional burden," he said.

ref: Gendon 称，在 Roa Roa 酒店倒塌的消息在滑翔伞社区中传开之后的几个小时里，他拼命给参加沙滩派对的巴鲁竞争对手发 WhatsApp 消息。
src: Mr. Gendon recounted how, in the hours after the news of the Roa Roa Hotel collapse circulated among the paragliding community, he had desperately sent WhatsApp messages to the Palu competitors, who were taking part in the beach festival.

ref: 然而，他的消息始终只显示一个灰色的对号，而不是一对蓝色的对号。
src: His messages, though, only resulted in one gray check mark, rather than a pair of blue checks.

ref: “我想这意味着消息没有发送成功”，他说。
src: "I think that means the messages were not delivered," he said.

ref: 盗贼在 Newport on the Levee 的 ATM 加钞时盗走 26,750 美元
src: Thieves take $26,750 during ATM refill at Newport on the Levee

ref: 纽波特警察局 (Newport Police Department) 发布的新闻报道介绍称，周五上午，一名 Brink 的工作人员在向 Newport on the Levee 的 ATM 里放钞票时，被盗贼偷走了 26,750 美元。
src: Thieves on Friday morning stole $26,750 from a Brink's worker refilling an ATM at Newport on the Levee, according to a news release from the Newport Police Department.

ref: 警察局的 Dennis McCarthy 在报道中介绍称，当时，这辆汽车司机清空好了这家娱乐餐厅的 ATM，正准备往里面加钞。
src: The car's driver had been emptying an ATM in the entertainment complex and preparing to deliver more money, Det. Dennis McCarthy wrote in the release.

ref: 就在他忙着的时候，一名男子“从这位 Brink 员工身后跑了出来”，偷走一袋本应加到 ATM 里的钞票。
src: While he was occupied, another man "ran up from behind the Brink's employee" and stole a bag of money meant for delivery.

ref: 据报道，目击者发现有多名嫌疑人逃离现场，但警方并未具体说明案件所涉及的人数。
src: Witnesses spotted multiple suspects fleeing the scene, according to the release, but police did not specify the number involved in the incident.

ref: 任何能够提供有关盗贼身份信息者，应致电 859-292-3680 联系纽波特警方。
src: Anyone with information about their identities should contact Newport police at 859-292-3680.

ref: 坎耶·维斯特：说唱歌手将他的名字改为 "Ye"
src: Kanye West: Rapper changes his name to Ye

ref: 说唱歌手坎耶·维斯特 (Kanye West) 改名为 "Ye"。
src: Rapper Kanye West is changing his name - to Ye.

ref: 他周六在 Twitter 上宣布更名。具体内容为："之前大家所熟知的坎耶·维斯特"。
src: Announcing the change on Twitter on Saturday, he wrote: "The being formally known as Kanye West."

ref: 现年 41 岁的维斯特被叫做 "Ye" 这个名字已经有一段时间了，他还将这个名字用作了 2018 年 6 月发布的第八张专辑的标题。
src: West, 41, has been nicknamed Ye for some time and used the moniker as the title for his eighth album, which was released in June.

ref: 这一更名宣布于他参加《周六夜现场》节目之前，预计他将在节目中推出他的新专辑《Yandhi》。
src: The change comes ahead of his appearance on Saturday Night Live, where he is expected to launch his new album Yandhi.

ref: 节目制作人说，他接替了因“感情原因”取消上节目安排的歌手阿里安娜·格兰德 (Ariana Grande)。
src: He replaces singer Ariana Grande on the show who cancelled for "emotional reasons," the show's creator said.

ref: 除了作为维斯特现在的专业名称的缩写之外，他之前曾说过，这个词对他来说具有宗教意义。
src: As well as being an abbreviation of his current professional name, West has previously said the word has religious significance for him.

ref: 维斯特今年年初与电台主播“大男孩” (Big Boy) 讨论他的专辑标题时曾说过：“我相信 ‘Ye’ 是《圣经》中最常用的单词，在《圣经》中是‘你’的意思。
src: "I believe 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible it means 'you,'" West said earlier this year, discussing his album title with radio host Big Boy.

ref: “这样，我就是你，就是我们。
src: "So I'm you, I'm us, it's us.

ref: 之前我用的名字是 "Kanye"，意思是“唯一”，现在改名为 "Ye"，这反映出了我们的善、恶、迷茫、一切。
src: It went from Kanye, which means the only one, to just Ye - just being a reflection of our good, our bad, our confused, everything.

ref: 这张专辑更多反映了我们是谁。”
src: The album is more of a reflection of who we are."

ref: 很多著名说唱歌手都改过名字。
src: He is one of a number of famous rappers to change their name.

ref: 肖恩·库姆斯 (Sean Combs) 用过很多个名字，最常用的是“Puff Daddy” (P. Diddy)（吹牛老爹）以及 Diddy（老爹），但今年他宣布自己更喜欢“Love（爱）”和“Brother Love（兄弟之情）”这两个名字。
src: Sean Combs has been variously known as Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year announced his preference for the names Love and Brother Love.

ref: 以前曾经与维斯特合作过的 JAY-Z 也曾经改过名字，改名的方式是用连字符或者不用连字符以及大写字母。
src: A former West collaborator, JAY-Z, has also made do with or without a hyphen and capitals.

ref: 墨西哥 AMLO 郑重宣告不会对平民使用武力
src: Mexico's AMLO vows not to use military against civilians

ref: 墨西哥当选总统安德烈斯·曼努埃尔·洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔郑重宣告，在该国即将迎来的学生迫害事件 50 周年之际，绝不会对平民使用武力。
src: Mexican President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has vowed to never use military force against civilians as the country approaches the 50th anniversary of a bloody reprisal against students.

ref: 周六，洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔在特拉特洛尔科广场 (Tlatelolco Plaza) 许下承诺，“绝不会使用武力，压制墨西哥人民”。
src: Lopez Obrador promised Saturday at Tlatelolco Plaza to "never ever use the military to repress the Mexican people."

ref: 1968 年 10 月 2 日，左派学生运动在整个拉丁美洲扎根之际，墨西哥部队在广场和平示威期间开枪射击，造成多达 300 人死亡。
src: Troops fired on a peaceful demonstration at the plaza on Oct. 2, 1968, killing as many as 300 people at a time when leftist student movements were taking root throughout Latin America.

ref: 洛佩斯·奥夫拉多尔承诺，将为学习人员提供补贴，并开设更多免费公立大学，以此支持墨西哥年轻一代的发展。
src: Lopez Obrador has pledged to support young Mexicans by giving monthly subsidies to those who study and opening more free public universities.

ref: 他表示，失业和缺乏教育机会会导致青少年走向犯罪道路。
src: He has said that unemployment and a lack of educational opportunities draws youth to criminal gangs.

ref: 美国应加倍 A.I. 资金
src: U.S. should double A.I. funding

ref: 随着中国在人工智能领域研究更加活跃，美国应将其在该领域的研究支出，增加一倍，投资者兼 AI 从业者 Kai-Fu Lee 介绍称。Lee 曾供职于谷歌、微软和苹果公司。
src: As China becomes more active in artificial intelligence, the U.S. should double the amount it spends on research in the field, says investor and AI practitioner Kai-Fu Lee, who has worked for Google, Microsoft and Apple.

ref: 此番言论针对的是美国政府各部门作出的 AI 公告，美国总体上，缺少正式的人工智能战略。
src: The comments come after various parts of the U.S. government have made AI announcements, even as the U.S. overall lacks a formal AI strategy.

ref: 而中国去年却推出了一项计划：力争在 2030 年，成为人工智能创新的老大。
src: Meanwhile, China introduced its plan last year: it's aiming to be No.1 in AI innovation by 2030.

ref: “在这一领域，所有其他国家都远远落后于美国，而我们正在寻找人工智能的新突破，所以，人工智能研究预算加倍将是一个良好的开端”，Lee 介绍道。
src: "Double the AI research budget would be a good start, given that all other countries are so much farther behind U.S., and we're looking for the next breakthrough in AI," said Lee.

ref: Lee 在本周接受 CNBC 采访时介绍称，资金加倍可能会使美国再次成为人工智能突破者的几率加倍。
src: Doubling funding could double the chances that the next big AI achievement will be made in the U.S., Lee told CNBC in an interview this week.

ref: Lee 的著作《人工智能超级大国：中国、硅谷与新世界秩序》于上个月由哈考特出版社出版。Lee 是 Sinovation Ventures 公司的 CEO，他投资了中国最知名的一家 AI 公司 Face++。
src: Lee, whose book "AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley and the New World Order" was published this month by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, is CEO of Sinovation Ventures, which has invested in one of the most prominent AI companies in China, Face++.

ref: 20 世纪 80年 代，他在卡耐基梅隆大学 (Carnegie Mellon University) 创建了一个人工智能系统，击败了排名最高的美国选手奥赛罗 (Othello)，之后，他又出任可微软研究院的高管和谷歌中国分公司的总裁。
src: In the 1980s at Carnegie Mellon University he worked on an AI system that beat the highest-ranked American Othello player, and later he was an executive at Microsoft Research and president of Google's China branch.

ref: Lee 对之前的美国政府科技竞赛，如国防部高级研究计划局 (Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency) 的机器人挑战赛 (Robotics Challenge) 做出了认可，随后发问，为了成就下一批梦想家还将推出什么竞赛。
src: Lee acknowledged previous U.S. government technology competitions like the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency's Robotics Challenge and asked when the next one would be, in order to help identify the next visionaries.

ref: 美国的研究人员为了获得政府补助，经常要大费周章，Lee 说道。
src: Researchers in the U.S. often have to work hard in order to win government grants, Lee said.

ref: “不是中国在抢我们的学术领导者，而是企业”，Lee 说道。
src: "It's not China that is taking away the academic leaders; it's the corporates," Lee said.

ref: 近年来，Facebook、谷歌和其他科技公司聘请了大学的杰出人士从事 AI 工作。
src: Facebook, Google and other technology companies have hired luminaries from universities to work on AI in recent years.

ref: Lee 介绍称，移民政策的变化也能帮助美国加强人工智能方面的工作。
src: Lee said immigration policy changes could also help the U.S. bolster its AI efforts.

ref: “我觉得应该为人工智能博士，主动提供绿卡”，他说道。
src: "I think green cards should automatically be offered to PhD's in AI," he said.

ref: 中国国务院于 2017 年 7 月发布了《新一代人工智能发展规划》。
src: China's State Council issued its Next Generation Artificial Intelligence Development Plan in July 2017.

ref: Lee 介绍称，在美国，美国研究人员可以获美国国家科学基金会 (National Science Foundation) 和其他政府组织拨发的资金，同样，在中国，国家自然科学基金会为学术机构的研究者提供资金，但中国的学术工作质量相对较差。
src: China's National Natural Science Foundation provides funding to people at academic institutions similar to the way that the National Science Foundation and other government organizations dole out money to U.S. researchers, but the quality of academic work is lower in China, Lee said.

ref: 今年年初，美国国防部成立了一个联合人工智能中心 (Joint Artificial Intelligence Center)，旨在吸引工业界和学术界的合作伙伴，此外，白宫还宣布成立了人工智能专责委员会 (Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence)。
src: Earlier this year the U.S. Defense Department established a Joint Artificial Intelligence Center, which is meant to involve partners from industry and academia, and the White House announced the formation of Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence.

ref: 本月，DARPA 宣布，为一项名为 AI Next 的项目投资 20 亿美元。
src: And this month DARPA announced a $2 billion investment in an initiative called AI Next.

ref: 目前，美国国家科学基金会每年在人工智能研究方面的投入资金都在 1 亿美元以上。
src: As for the NSF, it currently invests more than $100 million per year in AI research.

ref: 而相比之下，几个月便称要建立国家人工智能安全委员会 (National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence) 的美国立法部门，一直还没有采取行动。
src: Meanwhile, U.S. legislation that sought to create a National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence has not seen action in months.

ref: 马其顿就是否更改国名举行全民公投
src: Macedonians vote in referendum on whether to change country's name

ref: 马其顿人民周日举行全民公投，以表决是否将国名改为“北马其顿共和国”，此举将解决马其顿与希腊之间长达数十年的争端问题，希腊曾阻止其加入欧盟和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO)。
src: The people of Macedonia voted in a referendum on Sunday on whether to change its name to "Republic of North Macedonia," a move that would resolve a decades-old dispute with Greece which had blocked its membership bids for the European Union and NATO.

ref: 希腊有一个省也叫马其顿，保留着北部邻国的名字意味着希腊对其领土具有合法权利，并曾否决其加入北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)。
src: Greece, which has a province called Macedonia, maintains that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has vetoed its entrance into NATO and the EU.

ref: 两国政府于六月份就拟议的新国名称达成协议，但民族主义反对者认为，更改国名将危害马其顿斯拉夫多数人口的种族认同。
src: The two governments struck a deal in June based on the proposed new name, but nationalist opponents argue the change would undermine the ethnic identity of Macedonia's Slavic majority population.

ref: 总统格奥尔基·伊万诺夫 (Gjorge Ivanov) 表示，他不会参与公投，并且抵制活动令人怀疑投票结果是否会满足使公投生效的最低投票率 50%。
src: President Gjorge Ivanov has said he will not be voting in the referendum and a boycott campaign has cast doubts on whether turnout will meet the minimum 50 percent required for the referendum to be valid.

ref: 有关公投投票的问题如下：“你是为了北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU) 的成员身份而接受与希腊之间达成的协议吗？”
src: The question on the referendum ballot read: "Are you for NATO and EU membership with acceptance of the agreement with Greece."

ref: 包括总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 在内的更名支持者们认为，马其顿是南斯拉夫解体衍生的国家之一，寻求加入欧盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 等机构值得付出一定的代价。
src: Supporters of the name change, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that it is a price worth paying to pursue admission into bodies such as the EU and NATO for Macedonia, one of the countries to emerge from the collapse of Yugoslavia.

ref: “我今天来投票是为了国家的未来，为了马其顿的年轻一代，这样他们就可以在欧盟的保护伞下自由生活，因为这意味着我们所有人都能过上更安全的生活”，斯科普里 79 岁的奥利维拉·乔治耶夫斯卡 (Olivera Georgijevska) 说到。
src: "I came today to vote for the future of the country, for young people in Macedonia so they can be live freely under the umbrella of the European Union because it means safer lives for all of us," said Olivera Georgijevska, 79, in Skopje.

ref: 虽然没有受到法律约束，也有足够的议会议员表示他们会果断遵守投票结果。
src: Although not legally binding, enough members of parliament have said they will abide by the vote's outcome to make it decisive.

ref: 但更名需要获得议会三分之二多数投票。
src: The name change would requires a two-thirds majority in parliament.

ref: 州选举委员会表示，截至下午 1 时，尚未收到任何不法行为报告。
src: The state election commission said there had been no reports of irregularities by 1 p.m.

ref: 然而，投票率只有 16%，而 2016 年上次议会选举的投票率为 34%，当时有 66% 的注册选民参与投票。
src: However, turnout stood at only 16 percent, compared to 34 percent in last parliamentary election in 2016 when 66 percent of the registered voters cast their ballot.

ref: “我来投票是为了我的孩子，我们住在欧洲”，首都斯科普里 62 岁的 Gjose Tanevski 说到。
src: "I came out to vote because of my children, our place is in Europe," said Gjose Tanevski, 62, a voter in the capital, Skopje.

ref: 2018 年 9 月 30 日，马其顿总理佐兰·扎埃夫 (Zoran Zaev) 与妻子左瑞卡 (Zorica) 及儿子杜什克 (Dushko) 在马其顿更改国名的公投中投下了各自的选票，此次公投将为马其顿加入北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟铺平道路。
src: Macedonia's PM Zoran Zaev, his wife Zorica and his son Dushko cast their ballot for the referendum in Macedonia on changing the country's name that would open the way for it to join NATO and the European Union in Strumica, Macedonia September 30, 2018.

ref: 在斯科普里议会门前，54 岁的 Vladimir Kavardarkov 正在准备小型舞台，并把椅子挪到由抵制公投的人们搭建的帐篷前。
src: In front of parliament in Skopje, Vladimir Kavardarkov, 54, was preparing a small stage and pulling up chairs in front of tents set up by those who will boycott the referendum.

ref: “虽然是为了北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)，但是我们想挺胸抬头地加入，而不是通过走后门”，Kavardarkov 说到。
src: "We are for NATO and EU, but we want to join with our heads up, not through the service door" Kavadarkov said.

ref: “我们国家虽然贫穷，但是我们有尊严。
src: "We are a poor country, but we do have dignity.

ref: 如果他们不把我们当成马其顿人，我们可以求助于其他国家，如中国或俄罗斯，成为亚欧一体化成员”。
src: If they don't want to take us as Macedonia, we can turn to others like China and Russia and become part of Euro-Asia integration."

ref: 总体扎埃夫表示北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 的成员身份将为失业率高达 20% 以上的马其顿带来大量所需的投资。
src: Prime Minister Zaev says NATO membership will bring much needed investment to Macedonia, which has an unemployment rate of more than 20 percent.

ref: “我相信大多数人多会支持公投，因为我们 80% 以上的民众都支持北大西洋公约组织 (NATO) 和欧盟 (EU)”，扎埃夫投票后表示。
src: "I believe the huge majority will be in favor because more than 80 percent of our citizens are in favor of EU and NATO," Zaev said after casting his ballot.

ref: 他说“支持”的投票结果将“确定我们的未来”。
src: He said that a "yes" result would be "confirmation of our future."

ref: 马其顿政策研究所上周一公布的民意调查显示，30% 到 43% 的选民将参加公投 - 而这一数字则低于所需的投票率。
src: A poll published last Monday by Macedonia's Institute for Policy Research said between 30 and 43 percent of voters would take part in the referendum - below the required turnout.

ref: 马其顿 Telma TV 的另一项民意调查发现，57% 的调查对象称计划参与周日的投票。
src: Another poll, conducted by Macedonia's Telma TV, found 57 percent of respondents planning to vote on Sunday.

ref: 当然，70% 的民众表示他们将投出支持票。
src: Of those, 70 percent said they would vote yes.

ref: 公投若要取得成功，投票率须达到 50% 加一票。
src: For the referendum to be successful turnout needs to be 50 percent plus one vote.

ref: 公投失败意味着亲西方政府的政策将遭遇自去年五月上台以来的首次严重打击。
src: A failure in the referendum would represent the first serious blow to policy of the pro-Western government since it took over in May last year.

ref: 观看：曼城队塞尔吉奥·阿奎罗 (Sergio Aguero) 突破布莱顿队的严密防守获得进球
src: Watch: Manchester City's Sergio Aguero navigates through entire Brighton defense for goal

ref: 周六，在英格兰曼彻斯特的阿提哈德球场 (Etihad Stadium)，曼城队的塞尔吉奥·阿奎罗 (Sergio Aguero) 和拉希姆·斯特林 (Raheem Sterling) 双双突破布莱顿队的防守，最终以 2-0 获胜。
src: Sergio Aguero and Raheem Sterling dispatched of the Brighton defense in Manchester City's 2-0 win on Saturday at Etihad Stadium in Manchester, England.

ref: 阿奎罗第 65 分钟的进球看起来十分轻松。
src: Aguero made it look ridiculously easy on his score in the 65th minute.

ref: 比赛开始时，这位阿根廷前锋在中场接到传球。
src: The Argentine striker received a pass at midfield at the start of the sequence.

ref: 他快速跑过布莱顿队的三名防守队员，冲向开阔地带。
src: He raced between three Brighton defenders, before slashing into the open field.

ref: 随后阿奎罗发现自己被四名对方球员包围。
src: Aguero then found himself surrounded by four green shirts.

ref: 他推开了一名防守队员，又在布莱顿禁区边缘超过了几名防守队员。
src: He pushed around one defender before outrunning several more at the edge of the Brighton box.

ref: 然后把球推传到左边，传给了斯特林。
src: He then pushed a pass to his left, finding Sterling.

ref: 这位英国前锋利用他在禁区内的第一次触球将球传回给阿奎罗，阿奎罗用右脚射门将球射入球门右侧，击倒了布莱顿队门将马修·瑞安 (Mathew Ryan)。
src: The English forward used his first touch in the box to give the ball back to Aguero, who used his right boot to beat Brighton keeper Mathew Ryan with a shot into the right side of the net.

ref: “阿奎罗的脚部受伤了”，曼城队主教练佩普·瓜迪奥拉 (Pep Guardiola) 告诉记者。
src: "Aguero is struggling with some problems in his feet," City manager Pep Guardiola told reporters.

ref: “我们曾谈到让他上场 55 或 60 分钟。
src: "We spoke about him playing 55, 60 minutes.

ref: 他做到了。
src: That's what happened.

ref: 幸运的是，就在那一刻他进球了。”
src: We were lucky he scored a goal in that moment."

ref: 但是，是斯特林在英超联赛中为 Sky Blues 奠定了最初的优势。
src: But it was Sterling who gave the Sky Blues the initial advantage in the Premier League scuffle.

ref: 那个进球发生在第 29 分钟。
src: That goal came in the 29th minute.

ref: 在那场比赛中，阿奎罗在布莱顿队的后方接到了球。
src: Aguero received the ball deep in Brighton territory on that play.

ref: 他以一个漂亮的直传将球沿着左翼传给了勒鲁瓦·萨内 (Leroy Sane)。
src: He sent a beautiful through ball along the left flank to Leroy Sane.

ref: 几次触球后，萨内把斯特林引向了远门柱。
src: Sane took a few touches before leading Sterling toward the far post.

ref: 这位 Sky Blues 的前锋在滑出界外之前轻松将球入网。
src: The Sky Blues forward tapped the ball into the net just before sliding out of bounds.

ref: 周二下午 12：55，曼城队将在德国辛斯海姆的莱茵·内卡竞技球场 (Rhein-Neckar-Arena)，迎战欧洲冠军联赛 (Champions League) 小组赛中的对手霍芬海姆队。
src: City battles Hoffenheim in Champions League group play at 12:55 p.m. on Tuesday at Rhein-Neckar-Arena in Sinsheim, Germany.

ref: 谢泽尔 (Scherzer) 欲在对抗落矶队时从中作梗
src: Scherzer wants to play spoiler vs. Rockies

ref: 由于国民队在季后赛争夺中遭遇淘汰，再无更多理由迫使他们再次首发。
src: With the Nationals eliminated from playoff contention, there wasn't much reason to force another start.
