ref: 这个产品很新颖。”一位网友这样写道。
src: This is a genius product," one wrote.

ref: 另一位网友评论道：这条滑稽的广告针对的就是需要吸奶（通常是在公司或卫生间内）感觉自己像“奶牛”一样的妈妈。
src: Another commented: "This is a fun advert aimed at mums who pump (often in their workplaces or toilets) and feel like "cows."

ref: 并不无意要赞扬或是评判乳制品行业。”
src: This is not an advert praising or judging the dairy industry."

ref: 在视频结尾时，这群妈妈展示了自己在跳舞时，其实文胸中还穿戴了吸奶器。
src: At the end of the video the group of women reveal they've all been dancing with the discreet pumps tucked in their bras.

ref: 这条宣传广告后的创意，来源于许多女性在吸奶的时候称自己就像是奶牛。
src: The concept behind the campaign is based on the insight that many women who breast-pump say they feel like cows.

ref: 然而，Elvie 吸奶器完全静音，无需电线或管子，可以完美地放置于哺乳文胸内，让女性解放双手，可以抱着婴儿，甚至可以在外出时继续吸奶。
src: The Elvie Pump however, is completely silent, has no wires or tubes and fits discreetly inside a nursing bra, giving women the freedom to move, hold their babies, and even go out while pumping.

ref: Mother 的合伙人兼执行创意总监 (ECD) Ana Balarin 评论道：“Elvie Pump 是一款革命性的产品，值得大胆尝试。
src: Ana Balarin, partner and ECD at Mother commented: "The Elvie Pump is such a revolutionary product that it deserved a bold and provocative launch.

ref: 通过对比哺乳妈妈和奶牛，我们希望将吸奶的过程及其问题置于聚光灯下，同时以一种有趣又有关联的方式，展示这种新型吸奶器能给人带来无与伦比的自由感。
src: By drawing a parallel between expressing women and dairy cows we wanted to put breast pumping and all its challenges in the spotlight, while demonstrating in an entertaining and relatable way the incredible sense of freedom that the new pump will bring.

ref: 这已经不是 Elvie 吸奶器首次上头条新闻。
src: This is not the first time the Elvie pump has made the headlines.

ref: 在伦敦时装周期间，两个孩子的母亲穿着设计师 Marta Jakubowski 设计的服装登上 T 台，当时她便穿戴了这款产品。
src: During London Fashion Week, a mother of two appeared on the catwalk for designer Marta Jakubowski while using the product.

ref: 数百名流动儿童悄悄转移至德克萨斯州边境的一处露营地
src: Hundreds of Migrant Children Quietly Moved to a Tent Camp on the Texas Border

ref: 尽管每个月边境口岸的政策相对不会发生变化，但被扣留的流动儿童数量仍大幅上升，部分应归因于特朗普政府推行严厉的说辞和政策，增加了赞助者们安置儿童的难度。
src: The number of detained migrant children has spiked even though monthly border crossings have remained relatively unchanged, in part because harsh rhetoric and policies introduced by the Trump administration have made it harder to place children with sponsors.

ref: 传说大多数赞助者本身都是非法移民，他们担心站出来领养儿童会危及自身留在美国的可能性。
src: Traditionally, most sponsors have been undocumented immigrants themselves, and have feared jeopardizing their own ability to remain in the country by stepping forward to claim a child.

ref: 六月，联邦当局宣布潜在赞助者及其其他成年家庭成员必须提交指纹，并且当局将与移民局共享其指纹信息，这导致风险大大上升。
src: The risk increased in June, when federal authorities announced that potential sponsors and other adult members of their households would have to submit fingerprints, and that the data would be shared with immigration authorities.

ref: 上周，移民和海关执法局 (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) 的高级官员马修·阿尔伯塞特 (Matthew Albence) 在国会前证实，该机构已经逮捕数十名申请赞助无成人陪伴儿童的人员。
src: Last week, Matthew Albence, a senior official with Immigration and Customs Enforcement, testified before Congress that the agency had arrested dozens of people who applied to sponsor unaccompanied minors.

ref: 稍后，该机构证实称 70% 被逮捕的人均无犯罪前科。
src: The agency later confirmed that 70 percent of those arrested did not have prior criminal records.

ref: “近 80% 作为赞助者或赞助者家庭成员的个人均为非法入境，其中大部分为跨国罪犯。
src: "Close to 80 percent of the individuals that are either sponsors or household members of sponsors are here in the country illegally, and a large chunk of those are criminal aliens.

ref: 因此我们在不停地追捕这些人”，阿尔伯塞特说到。
src: So we are continuing to pursue those individuals," Mr. Albence said.

ref: 据庇护所工作人员称，为了尽快解决这些儿童的问题，官员们推出了新的规定，要求其中一些孩子在被扣留的一个月（而不是之前规定的 60 天后）内出庭。
src: Seeking to process the children more quickly, officials introduced new rules that will require some of them to appear in court within a month of being detained, rather than after 60 days, which was the previous standard, according to shelter workers.

ref: 很多儿童不会亲自出庭，相反，将以视频电话会议的形式出现，向移民法官就自己的合法身份进行辩护。
src: Many will appear via video conference call, rather than in person, to plead their case for legal status to an immigration judge.

ref: 那些被认为不符合救济资格的儿童将被迅速驱逐出境。
src: Those who are deemed ineligible for relief will be swiftly deported.

ref: 据庇护所工作人员以及近几个月该系统的报告称，儿童被扣留的时间越长，他们就越有可能变得焦虑或抑郁，从而导致产生暴力行为或逃跑企图。
src: The longer that children remain in custody, the more likely they are to become anxious or depressed, which can lead to violent outbursts or escape attempts, according to shelter workers and reports that have emerged from the system in recent months.

ref: 辩护律师表示，在像 Tornillo 这样的大型设施中，这方面的担忧更为严重，因为这样的地方规模过于庞大，很容易忽视儿童反抗的迹象。
src: Advocates said those concerns are heightened at a larger facility like Tornillo, where signs that a child is struggling are more likely to be overlooked, because of its size.

ref: 他们补充说，在儿童没有足够的时间在情感上做好准备，也没有足够的时间和朋友们道别的情况下，将儿童转移到帐篷城，可能会加重很多儿童本就已经遭受的创伤。
src: They added that moving children to the tent city without providing enough time to prepare them emotionally or to say goodbye to friends could compound trauma that many are already struggling with.

ref: 叙利亚勒令美国、法国和土耳其的“占领军”立即撤离
src: Syria tells US, French and Turkish 'occupying forces' to withdraw immediately

ref: 外交部长瓦立德·穆阿利姆 (Walid al-Moualem) 在联合国大会 (UN General Assembly) 上的发言也呼吁叙利亚难民尽快回国，尽管叙利亚战争已经持续八年。
src: Addressing the UN General Assembly, Foreign Minister Walid al-Moualem also called on Syrian refugees to come home, even though the country's war is now in its eighth year.

ref: 同时担任叙利亚副总理的穆阿利姆表示，外国军队以打击恐怖主义为借口，非法进入叙利亚领土，“将得到相应的处理”。
src: Moualem, who also serves as deputy prime minister, said the foreign forces were on Syrian soil illegally, under the pretext of fighting terrorism, and "will be dealt with accordingly."

ref: “他们必须立即无条件撤离”，穆阿利姆向联合国大会表示。
src: "They must withdraw immediately and without any conditions," he told the assembly.

ref: 穆阿利姆坚持称叙利亚的“反恐战争即将结束”，自 2011 年以来战争已经导致 360,000 多人死亡，数百万人流离失所。
src: Moualem insisted that the "war on terror is almost over" in Syria, where more than 360,000 people have died since 2011, with millions more uprooted from their homes.

ref: 他表示，大马士革方面将继续“对抗这场祭祀之战，直到我们清除叙利亚领土”上的所有恐怖组织和“所有非法外国势力。”
src: He said Damascus would continue "fighting this sacred battle until we purge all Syrian territories" of both terror groups and "any illegal foreign presence."

ref: 美国有 2,000 多名士兵驻扎在叙利亚，主要负责为反对总统巴沙尔·阿萨德 (Bashar al-Assad) 的库尔德部队和叙利亚阿拉伯人提供培训和咨询。
src: The United States has some 2,000 troops in Syria, mainly training and advising both Kurdish forces and Syrian Arabs opposed to President Bashar al-Assad.

ref: 法国有 1,000 多名士兵驻扎在这个战乱的国家。
src: France has more than 1,000 troops on the ground in the war-wracked country.

ref: 对于难民问题，穆阿利姆表示条件允许他们回国，并谴责“某些西方国家”“传播非理性恐惧”迫使他们背井离乡。
src: On the issue of refugees, Moualem said the conditions were fine for them to return, and he blamed "some western countries" for "spreading irrational fears" that prompted refugees to stay away.

ref: “我们已经呼吁国际社会和人道主义组织帮助促成难民回国”，他表示。
src: "We have called upon the international community and humanitarian organizations to facilitate these returns," he said.

ref: “他们正在将纯粹的人道主义问题政治化”。
src: "They are politicizing what should be a purely humanitarian issue."

ref: 美国和欧盟已经警告称，不会为叙利亚提供重建援助，直至阿萨德与反对派达成终止战争的政治协议。
src: The United States and the European Union have warned that there will be no reconstruction aid for Syria until there is a political agreement between Assad and the opposition to end the war.

ref: 联合国 (UN) 外交官表示，俄罗斯和土耳其近期就在伊德利卜最后一个主要叛军据点建立缓冲区达成协议，此举为推进政治谈判创造了机会。
src: UN diplomats say a recent agreement between Russia and Turkey to set up a buffer zone in the last major rebel stronghold of Idlib has created an opportunity to press ahead with political talks.

ref: 俄罗斯和土耳其之间的协议避免了俄罗斯支持的叙利亚军队对居住有三百万人口的省发起大规模进攻。
src: The Russian-Turkish deal averted a large-scale assault by Russian-backed Syrian forces on the province, where three million people live.

ref: 然而，穆阿利姆强调，这项协议有“明确的最后期限”，并表示希望军事行动将目标指向圣战者，包括“将被根除”的与基地组织有关的努斯拉阵线的武装分子。
src: Moualem however stressed that the agreement had "clear deadlines" and expressed hope that military action will target jihadists including fighters from the Al-Qaeda-linked Nusra Front, who "will be eradicated."

ref: 联合国特使德米苏图拉 (Staffan de Mistura) 希望由政府和反对派成员组成的新委员会尽快召开首次会议，起草叙利亚战后宪法，为选举铺平道路。
src: UN envoy Staffan de Mistura is hoping to soon convene the first meetings of a new committee comprised of government and opposition members to draft a post-war constitution for Syria and pave the way to elections.

ref: 穆阿利姆列出了叙利亚政府加入委员会的条件，他表示，委员会的工作应该限制为“审查现行宪法的条款”，并警告不要加以干涉。
src: Moualem laid out conditions for the Syrian government's participation in the committee, saying the panel's work should be restricted "to reviewing the articles of the current constitution," and warned against interference.

ref: 特朗普为什么会赢得连任
src: Why Trump Will Win a Second Term

ref: 按照这种逻辑，特朗普将在 2020 年赢得连任，除非如众多自由观众所愿，弹劾和丑闻提前终止他的总统任期。
src: By that logic, Mr. Trump would win re-election in 2020 unless, as many liberal viewers are probably hoping, impeachment and scandal end his presidency prematurely.

ref: 毫无疑问的是，“这将成为有史以来最具戏剧性的总统任期结局！”
src: In what would no doubt be "The most dramatic finale of a presidency ever!"

ref: 但是到目前为止，人们似乎还没有出现审美疲劳的迹象。
src: As of now, there are no signs of viewer fatigue.

ref: 自 2014 年以来，美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 黄金时段的收视率增长了不止一倍多，达到了 105 万，而微软全国广播电视公司 (MSNBC) 的收视率则增至三倍，达到了 160 万。
src: Since 2014, prime-time ratings have more than doubled to 1.05 million at CNN and nearly tripled to 1.6 million at MSNBC.

ref: 尼尔森 (Nielsen) 的数据显示，福克斯新闻 (Fox News) 黄金时段的平均观众人数从四年前的 170 万上升至 240 万，而 MSNBC 的《雷切尔·玛多秀》(The Rachel Maddow Show) 凭借主要夜间新闻高达 350 万的观众人数稳居有线电视收视率榜首。
src: Fox News has an average of 2.4 million prime-time viewers, up from 1.7 million four years ago, according to Nielsen, and MSNBC's "The Rachel Maddow Show" has topped cable ratings with as many as 3.5 million viewers on major news nights.

ref: 对于在一场摧毁美国国会大厦的袭击后成为总统的这位内阁大臣，美国广播公司 (ABC) 电视剧《指定幸存者》(Designated Survivor) 的制作人尼尔·贝尔 (Neal Baer) 表示，“因为我们不理解，所以人们像飞蛾扑火般被吸引”。
src: "This is a fire that people are being drawn to because it's not something we understand," said Neal Baer, show runner of the ABC drama "Designated Survivor," about a cabinet secretary who becomes president after an attack destroys the Capitol.

ref: 资深喜剧作家，《Just the Funny Parts：And a Few Hard Truths About Sneaking Into the Hollywood Boys’ Club》的作者尼尔·斯科维尔 (Nell Scovell) 则坚持另一种理论。
src: Nell Scovell, a veteran comedy writer and author of "Just the Funny Parts: And a Few Hard Truths About Sneaking Into the Hollywood Boys" Club," has another theory.

ref: 斯科维尔告诉我，她依然记得 2016 年大选前夕在波士顿搭计程车的情景。
src: She remembers a cab ride in Boston before the 2016 election.

ref: 司机告诉她，他会将投票给特朗普。
src: The driver told her he would be voting for Mr. Trump.

ref: 为什么？她问道。
src: Why? she asked.

ref: “他说，‘因为他能让我笑’。”
src: "He said, "Because he makes me laugh,"" Ms. Scovell told me.

ref: 混乱之中不乏娱乐性。
src: There is entertainment value in the chaos.

ref: 当然，不同于电视上的其他节目，无论这个移民大家庭最终能否重新团结起来，也无论全球经济能否健康发展，华盛顿的这条故事线都有可能决定着罗诉韦德案 (Roe v. Wade) 的未来。
src: Of course, unlike anything else on TV, the story lines coming out of Washington could determine the future of Roe v. Wade, whether immigrant families can reunite and the health of the global economy.

ref: 而调台则是只有最具特权的观众才能负担得起的奢侈享受。
src: Tuning out is a luxury only the most privileged viewers can afford.

ref: 然而，当你发现自己已经连续 6 小时观看专家小组讨论鲍勃·伍德沃德 (Bob Woodward) 在其著作《恐惧》(Fear) 中所用的“深层背景”根源，保罗·马纳福特 (Paul Manafort) 价值 15,000 美元的鸵鸟毛短夹克（《华盛顿邮报》称其为“傲慢的厚衣服”）以及斯托米·丹尼尔斯 (Stormy Daniels) 有关特朗普（呃，骨骼）耸人听闻的描述所暗指的含义时，你会发现这远远超出了一个普通公民的知情范围。
src: And yet, it goes beyond being an informed citizen when you find yourself on hour six of watching a panel of experts debate Bob Woodward's use of "deep background" sourcing for his book "Fear," Paul Manafort's $15,000 ostrich-leather bomber jacket ("a garment thick with hubris," The Washington Post said) and the implications of Stormy Daniels's lurid descriptions of Mr. Trump's, um, anatomy.

ref: 就我而言，我再也不会以同样的方式看待《超级马里奥》了。
src: I, for one, will never look at Super Mario the same way again.

ref: 关于特朗普节目的演员轮换和日常的曲折情节（寻衅与美国职业橄榄球大联盟 (N.F.L.) 对抗，歌颂金正恩），舵手室娱乐制作公司 (Wheelhouse Entertainment) 董事长、《典当之星》(Pawn Stars) 创作者布伦特·蒙哥马利 (Brent Montgomery) 表示，“他正在做的某些事情让人感觉这像是一场真人秀，他每天晚上都在向你灌输一些东西”。
src: "Part of what he's doing that makes it feel like a reality show is that he is feeding you something every night," said Brent Montgomery, chief executive of Wheelhouse Entertainment and the creator of "Pawn Stars," about the Trump show's rotating cast and daily plot twists (picking a fight with the N.F.L., praising Kim Jong-un).

ref: 你一集都不能错过，否则就会跟不上。
src: You can't afford to miss one episode or you're left behind.

ref: 本周我与弗莱斯 (Fleiss) 见面那天是一个晴朗的日子，他位于考艾岛北岸的居所室外温度高达 80 华氏度，但他却在录制 CNN 的节目时，躲在屋里看 MSNBC。
src: When I reached Mr. Fleiss this week, it was a sunny 80 degrees outside his home on the north shore of Kauai, but he was holed up inside watching MSNBC while recording CNN.

ref: 没有布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 与他共同面对参议院司法委员会，最高法院的未来也悬而未决，他感到无法摆脱自己。
src: He couldn't peel himself away, not with Brett Kavanaugh set to face the Senate Judiciary Committee and the future of the Supreme Court hanging in the balance.

ref: 弗莱斯告诉我，“我记得当我们白天在幕后筹划那些疯狂的节目时，人们说，‘这是西方文明终结的预兆’”。
src: "I remember when we were doing all those crazy shows back in the day and people said, "This is the beginning of the end of Western civilization,"" Mr. Fleiss told me.

ref: “我本以为这听起来有点像笑话，但事实证明他们是对的”。
src: "I thought it was sort of a joke, but it turns out they were right."

ref: 艾米·柯西克 (Amy Chozick) 是《泰晤士报》商业、政治和媒体板块的特约编辑，也是回忆录《追逐希拉里》(Chasing Hillary) 的作者。
src: Amy Chozick, a writer at large for The Times covering business, politics and media, is the author of the memoir "Chasing Hillary."

ref: 大笔现金投向最激烈的国会中期选举众议院席位争夺战
src: Outside money floods into tightest midterm election House races

ref: 国会选区的重新划分，引得两名现任议员对宾州第 17 选区同一席位的角逐，大量的现金源源不断地流入，不足为奇。
src: It's not surprising that Pennsylvania's 17th is seeing a flood of cash, thanks to a realignment of a congressional districts that landed two incumbents in a race for the same seat.

ref: 最近重划的郊区匹兹堡选区，成为了民主党众议员科纳·兰姆 (Conor Lamb) 角逐的目标，而他在去年春天的一次特别选举中，赢得了另一个选区的席位。
src: This recently redrawn suburban Pittsburg district pits Democrat Rep. Conor Lamb - who won his seat in another district in a special election last spring.

ref: 兰姆面临的竞争对手是现任议员共和党人凯斯·罗斯福士 (Keith Rothfus)，目前代表的是原本的宾州第 12 选区，而该选区与新的第 17 选区有重叠。
src: Lamb is running against another incumbent, Republican Keith Rothfus, who currently represents the old Pennsylvania 12th district, which overlaps heavily with the new 17th.

ref: 宾州最高法院于 1 月份作出裁决，称旧的国会选区地图对共和党人有利，属于违宪行为，因此重新划分了选区。
src: The maps were redrawn after the Pennsylvania Supreme Court ruled in January that the old districts were unconstitutionally gerrymandered in Republicans' favor.

ref: 第 17 选区新席位的角逐，引发了主要党派财政部门——民主党国会竞选委员会 (DCCC) 和共和党国会委员会 (NRCC) 之间的竞选财务问题。
src: The race in the new 17th has touched off a campaign finance slugfest between the major party finance arms, the Democratic Campaign Congressional Committee (DCCC) and the National Republican Campaign Committee (NRCC).

ref: 3 月份举行的广受关注的宾州第 18 选区特别选举中，兰姆以微弱的优势险胜，而后，兰姆在宾夕法尼亚州便成了一个家喻户晓的名字。
src: Lamb became a familiar name in Pennsylvania after a narrow win in a widely watched in March special election for Pennsylvania's 18th Congressional District.

ref: 之前，这一席位由共和党人稳坐了十多年，而唐纳德·特朗普总统以 20 个百分点的优势在这个选区获胜。
src: That seat had been held by a Republican for over a decade, and President Donald Trump won the district by 20 points.

ref: 政治专家为民主党创造了一点儿优势。
src: Political pundits have given Democrats a slight edge.

ref: 美国曾考虑因萨尔瓦多支持中国而对其进行处罚，但最终选择放弃
src: U.S. Weighed Penalizing El Salvador Over Support for China, Then Backed Off

ref: 外交官指出，多米尼加共和国和巴拿马已经认可了北京，几乎没有受到华盛顿的阻拦。
src: Diplomats noted that the Dominican Republic and Panama had already recognized Beijing, with little pushback from Washington.

ref: 特朗普于 2017 年 6 月与巴拿马总统胡安·卡洛斯·瓦雷拉 (Juan Carlos Varela) 进行了亲切会面，随后驻留在巴拿马，直至合作伙伴对特朗普政府的管理团队进行驱逐。

ref: 联邦检察官为纽约恐怖袭击嫌疑人寻求罕见的死刑
src: Federal prosecutors seeking rare death penalty for NYC terror attack suspect

ref: 美国纽约联邦检察官希望对纽约嫌犯赛富洛·赛波夫 (Sayfullo Saipov) 判处死刑。此起恐怖袭击导致 8 人死亡，是自 1953 年以来，纽约市以这种罪名处理的一起罕见案例。
src: Federal prosecutors in New York are seeking the death penalty for Sayfullo Saipov, the suspect in the New York City terror attack that killed eight people -- a rare punishment that hasn't been carried out in the state for a federal crime since 1953.

ref: 指控称，10 月份，30 岁的赛波夫驾驶 Home Depot 租赁卡车在曼哈顿下城西侧高速公路上，驶入自行车道，碾压路上的行人和骑自行车的人。
src: Saipov, 30, allegedly used a Home Depot rental truck to carry out an attack on a bike path along the West Side Highway in Lower Manhattan, mowing down pedestrians and cyclist in his path on Oct.

src: In order to justify a death sentence, prosecutors will have to prove that Saipov "intentionally" killed the eight victims and "intentionally" inflicted serious bodily injury, according to the notice of intent to seek the death penalty, filed in the Southern District of New York.

ref: 根据这份法庭文件介绍，这两项罪名均可判处死刑。

src: Weeks after the attack, a federal grand jury slapped Saipov with a 22-count indictment that included eight charges of murder in aid of racketeering, typically used by federal prosecutors in organized crime cases, and a charge of violence and destruction of motor vehicles.

ref: 检察官称，这次袭击需要“大量的计划和预谋工作”，并介绍称赛波夫袭击的方式“令人发指、残忍卑鄙”。
src: The attack required "substantial planning and premeditation," prosecutors said, describing the manner in which Saipov carried it out as "heinous, cruel and depraved."

ref: 意向通知书中介绍称“赛富洛·赛波夫让受害者 Diego Enrique Angelini、Nicholas Cleves、Ann-Laure Decadt、Darren Drake、Ariel Erlij、Hernan Ferruchi、Hernan Diego Mendoza 和 Alejandro Damian Pagnucco 的家人和朋友蒙受了巨大的伤害和损失”。
src: "Sayfullo Habibullaevic Saipov caused injury, harm, and loss to the families and friends of Diego Enrique Angelini, Nicholas Cleves, Ann-Laure Decadt, Darren Drake, Ariel Erlij, Hernan Ferruchi, Hernan Diego Mendoza, and Alejandro Damian Pagnucco," the notice of intent states.

ref: 遇难者中，５ 人是来自阿根廷的游客。
src: Five of the victims were tourists from Argentina.

ref: 纽约南区上一次起诉死刑案已经过去 10 年了。
src: It has been a decade since the Southern District of New York last prosecuted a death penalty case.

ref: 被告哈立德·巴恩斯 (Khalid Barnes) 被判谋杀两名毒品供应商，但最终于 2009 年 9 月被判处终身监禁。
src: The defendant, Khalid Barnes, was convicted of murdering two drug suppliers but was ultimately sentenced to life in prison in September 2009.

ref: 上一次在纽约联邦法庭执行死刑是在 1953 年，当时朱利叶斯 (Julius) 和埃塞尔·罗森伯格 (Ethel Rosenberg) 被判谋杀罪。这对夫妇在两年前的冷战期间，因苏联间谍罪被处决。
src: The last time the death penalty was carried out in a New York federal case was in 1953 for Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, a married couple executed after they were convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage for the Soviet Union during the Cold War two years before.

ref: 法庭文件显示，赛波夫为乌兹别克斯坦人，在袭击发生后的几天甚至几个月里，他并未表现出任何自责。
src: Saipov, a native of Uzbekistan, demonstrated a lack of remorse in the days and months following the attack, according to court documents.

ref: 警方称，他向调查人员表示，对自己的所作所为感到满意。

ref: 西姆斯，20 岁，于周五早上在南方大学附近被枪击身亡。
src: Sims, 20, was shot and killed near Southern University's campus early Friday.

ref: 据 247sports 报道，周六警察局长墨菲 J. 保罗 (Murphy J. Paul) 向媒体透露，“韦德·西姆斯 (Wayde Sims) 头部受枪伤，最终导致死亡”。
src: "Wayde Sims suffered a gunshot wound to the head and ultimately died as a result," police chief Murphy J. Paul told the media Saturday, per 247sports.

ref: 韦德上前替朋友辩解，结果被辛普森开枪击中。
src: Wayde stepped in to defend his friend and was shot by Simpson.

ref: 面对审问，辛普森承认当时在现场且持有武器，也承认射杀了韦德·西姆斯 (Wayde Sims)。
src: Simpson was questioned and admitted to being on scene, in possession of a weapon, and admitted to shooting Wayde Sims.

ref: 毫无意外，辛普森被逮捕，并收押在东巴吞鲁日教区警察局。
src: Simpson was arrested without incident and taken into custody at East Baton Rouge Parish Police Department.

ref: 从小在巴吞鲁日长大的少年西姆斯，身高 6 英尺 6 英寸，上个赛季共参加了 32 场比赛，获得 10 次首发，每场平均上场 17.4 分钟，得分 5.6 分，2.9 个篮板球。
src: A 6-foot-6 junior who grew up in Baton Rouge, Sims played in 32 games with 10 starts last season and averaged 17.4 minutes, 5.6 points and 2.9 rebounds per game.

ref: 俄罗斯大奖赛：刘易斯·汉密尔顿在车队指令的帮助下赢得塞巴斯蒂安·维特尔
src: Russian Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton closes in on world title after team orders hand him win over Sebastian Vettel

ref: 从瓦特利·波塔斯 (Valtteri Bottas) 于上周六击败刘易斯·汉密尔顿 (Lewis Hamilton) 获得参赛资格的那一刻起，便可以清楚地看到，梅赛德斯“车队指令将在比赛中发挥很大作用”。
src: It became clear from the moment that Valtteri Bottas qualified ahead of Lewis Hamilton on Saturday that Mercedes" team orders would play a large part in the race.

ref: 从杆位发车开始，波塔斯一路领先，在前两轮防守时几乎坑苦了汉密尔顿，还引诱维特尔攻击队友。
src: From pole, Bottas got a good start and almost hung Hamilton out to dry as he defended his position in the first two turns and invited Vettel to attack his teammate.

ref: 维特尔首先进入了维修站，汉密尔顿跑到车队的末尾，这原本应该决定了结局。
src: Vettel went into the pits first and left Hamilton to run into the traffic at the tail of the pack, something which should have been decisive.

ref: 一圈之后，梅赛德斯进站，重回跑道时已落后于维特尔，在一番争锋相对之后，为了避免在第三个弯道双重防守后保持不动，这位法拉利车手（维特尔）不情愿地将内道让出，汉密尔顿夺回领先位置。
src: The Mercedes pitted a lap later and came out behind Vettel, but Hamilton went ahead after some wheel-to-wheel action that saw the Ferrari driver reluctantly leave the inside free at risk of holding out after a double-move to defend on the third corner.

ref: 当天正值 21 岁生日的马克思?维斯塔潘 (Max Verstappen) 起跑时位于赛道的后排，第一圈结束后，跑到了第 7 的位置。
src: Max Verstappen started from the back row of the grid and was in seventh by the end of the first lap on his 21st birthday.

ref: 在比赛的大部分时间里，他全速前进，力争快速完成比赛，超过基米·莱科宁 (Kimi Raikkonen)，跑到了第 4 的位置。
src: He then led for a large part of the race as he held onto his tyres to target a quick finish and overtake Kimi Raikkonen for fourth.

ref: 他最终在第 44 圈进入了维修站，在剩下的 8 圈中，未能将速度提上来，最终，莱科宁获得了第四名。
src: He eventually came into the pits on the 44th lap but was unable to increase his pace in the remaining eight laps as Raikkonen took fourth.

ref: 汉密尔顿说道：“今天很难熬，因为瓦特利整个周末的表现都相当出色，他很绅士地将位置让给了我。
src: It's a difficult day because Valtteri did a fantastic job all weekend and was a real gentleman told let me by.

ref: 车队取得了第一和第二的成绩，很是出色。”
src: The team have done such an exceptional job to have a one two," said Hamilton.

ref: w肢体语言可真不怎么样
src: That Was Really Bad Body Language

ref: 唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 总统在周六举行的集会上嘲讽了参议员黛安娜·范斯坦 (Dianne Feinstein)，因为她坚称自己没有泄露有关克里斯汀·布莱西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 指控最高法院候选人布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 性侵的信件。
src: President Donald Trump mocked Senator Dianne Feinstein at a rally on Saturday over her insistence she did not leak the letter from Christine Blasey Ford accusing Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh of sexual assault.

ref: 在西佛吉尼亚州一次集会的发言中，特朗普总统并没有直接就福特在参议院司法委员会面前提供的证词发表讲话，相反，他评论到，参议院目前发生的一切很好地证明了人们是多么的“卑鄙、肮脏、虚伪”。
src: Speaking at a rally in West Virginia, the president did not directly address the testimony given by Ford before the Senate Judiciary Committee, instead commenting that what was going on in the Senate showed that people were "mean and nasty and untruthful."

ref: 特朗普表示，“当你们看到愤怒，当你们看到愤怒、卑鄙、肮脏、虚伪的人们时，有一件事情可能会发生，而美好的事情过去几天正在参议院发生着”。
src: "The one thing that could happen and the beautiful thing that is going on over the last few days in the Senate, when you see the anger, when you see people that are angry and mean and nasty and untruthful," he said.

ref: “当你们得知消息的发布和泄漏，然后他们说“哦，这不是我干的。
src: "When you look at releases and leaks and then they say "oh, I didn't do it.

ref: 这不是我干的”。
src: I didn't do it."

ref: 记得吗？
src: Remember?

ref: 黛安娜·范斯坦 (Dianne Feinstein)，消息是你泄漏的吗？
src: Dianne Feinstein, did you leak?

ref: 记住她的回答......文件是你泄漏的吗 - “哦，哦，什么？
src: Remember her answer... did you leak the document - "oh, oh, what?

ref: 哦，没有。
src: Oh, no.

ref: 我没有泄漏”。
src: I didn't leak."

ref: 那么，请稍等。
src: Well, wait one minute.

ref: 是我们泄漏的吗......不，不是我们”，他补充到，参议员回忆到。
src: Did we leak...No, we didn't leak," he added, in an impression of the senator.

ref: 7 月份，范斯坦收到了福特寄回的详细描述对卡瓦诺的指控的信件，而该信件于 9 月初遭到泄漏 - 但是范斯坦否认她的办公室导致了此次泄漏事件的发生。
src: Feinstein was sent the letter detailing the allegations against Kavanaugh by Ford back in July, and it was leaked earlier in September - but Feinstein denied that the leak came from her office.

ref: 据《国会山报》报道，范斯坦向委员会透露，“我并没有隐瞒福特博士的指控，也没有泄漏她的遭遇”。
src: "I did not hide Dr. Ford's allegations, I did not leak her story," Feinstein told the committee, The Hill reported.

ref: “她要求我对信件保密，而我也按照她的要求进行了保密”。
src: "She asked me to hold it confidential and I kept it confidential as she asked."

ref: 但是她的否认似乎并没有被总统接受，总统在周六晚上举行的集会上评论道：“听着，肢体语言可真不怎么样。
src: But her denial did not appear to sit well with the president, who commented during the Saturday night rally: "I'll tell you what, that was really bad body language.

ref: 也许她没有，但那是我见过最糟糕的肢体语言了。”
src: Maybe she didn't, but that's the worst body language I've ever seen."

ref: 总统继续为这位被三名女性指控性行为不端的最高法院候选人辩护着，称民主党在利用此次指控达到他们自己的目的。
src: Continuing his defense of the Supreme Court nominee, who has been accused of sexual misconduct by three women, the president suggested that the Democrats were using the allegations for their own ends.

ref: 据《Mediaite》报道，总统表示，“他们一定会通过任何必要的手段夺回权力。
src: "They are determined to take back power by any means necessary.

ref: 你们看那些卑鄙、肮脏的手段，他们不在乎伤害了谁，也不在乎要扳倒谁来获得权力和控制权”。
src: You see the meanness, the nastiness, they don't care who they hurt, who they have to run over to get power and control," Mediaite reported the president saying.

ref: 精英联赛：Dundee Stars 5-3 战败 Belfast Giants
src: Elite League: Dundee Stars 5-3 Belfast Giants

ref: Patrick Dwyer 赢得对手 Dundee 两球，为 Giants 赢得比赛
src: Patrick Dwyer hit two goals for the Giants against Dundee

ref: 周六，Dundee Stars 在第二回合比赛中以 5-3 赢得比赛，弥补了周五精英联赛中败战 Belfast Giants 的遗憾。
src: Dundee Stars atoned for Friday's Elite League loss against Belfast Giants by winning the return match 5-3 in Dundee on Saturday.

ref: Patrick Dwyer 与 Francis Beauvillier 进球，为 Giants 队在比赛开始取得了两球领先优势。
src: The Giants got an early two-goal lead through strikes from Patrick Dwyer and Francis Beauvillier.

ref: 在 Dwyer 为 Giants 扳回领先优势之前，Mike Sullivan 和 Jordan Cownie 打出了主场水平。
src: Mike Sullivan and Jordan Cownie brought the home side level before Dwyer restored the Giants' lead.

ref: 在 Lukas Lundvald Nielsen 两个进球取得胜利之前，Francois Bouchard 为 Dundee 扳平了比分。
src: Francois Bouchard equalised for Dundee before two Lukas Lundvald Nielsen goals secured their victory.

ref: 这是 Adam Keefe 的球队在本赛季精英联赛中第三次失利，他们在周五晚上在贝尔法斯特以 2-1 击败了 Dundee。
src: It was a third Elite League defeat of the season for Adam Keefe's men, who had come from behind to beat Dundee 2-1 in Belfast on Friday night.

ref: 这是本赛季两队的第四次碰面，之前的三场比赛中，Giants 皆赢得了比赛。
src: It was a fourth meeting of the season between the sides, with the Giants winning the previous three matches.

ref: Dwyer 在第四分钟的 3 分 35 秒 Kendall McFaull 的助攻下开始的揭幕战，而在 David Rutherford 的助攻，Beauvillier 在四分钟后，将领先优势扩大了一倍。
src: Dwyer's opener came in the fourth minute on 3:35 from a Kendall McFaull assist, with David Rutherford providing the assist as Beauvillier doubled the lead four minutes later.

ref: 在紧张忙碌的揭幕战中，Sullivan 在 13:10 时取得主场优势，之后 Matt Marquardt 在 15:16 为 Cownie 扳平比分。
src: In what was a busy opening period, Sullivan brought the home side back into the game on 13:10 before Matt Marquardt became provider for Cownie's equaliser on 15:16.

ref: Dwyer 在第一节比赛结束时，打进了当晚的第二个进球，使 Giants 在第一节就取得了领先。
src: Dwyer made sure the Giants took a lead into the first break when he hit his second goal of the night at the end of the first period.

ref: 主队重整旗鼓，Bouchard 在 27 分 37 秒发起强力进攻，再次将比分扳平。
src: The home side regrouped and Bouchard once again put them on level terms with a power play goal on 27:37.

ref: Cownie 和 Charles Corcoran 联手，帮助 Nielsen 在第二节后半段的比赛中首次领先 Dundee，并在最后一节比赛进行到一半时，打进了球队的第五球，从而确保了比赛的胜利。
src: Cownie and Charles Corcoran combined to help Nielsen give Dundee the lead for the first time in the match late in the second period and he made sure of the win with his team's fifth halfway through the final period.

ref: Giants 在过去五场比赛中输了四场，他们将在周五的下一场比赛中，主场迎战 Milton Keynes。
src: The Giants, who have now lost four of their last five matches, are at home to Milton Keynes in their next match on Friday.

ref: 航空交通管制员用生命确保机上数百名乘客成功逃离地震
src: Air Traffic Controller Dies To Ensure Hundreds On Plane Can Escape Earthquake

ref: 印度尼西亚一名航空交通管制员为确保一架载有数百人的飞机安全起飞而失去生命，事后被人们誉为英雄。
src: An air traffic controller in Indonesia is being hailed as a hero after he died ensuring that a plane carrying hundreds of people made it safely off the ground.

ref: 周五，苏拉威西岛发生大地震，引发海啸，造成 800 多人死亡，多人失踪。
src: More than 800 people have died and many are missing after a major earthquake hit the island of Sulawesi on Friday, triggering a tsunami.

ref: 强烈的余震持续吞噬着这一地区，在巴鲁市，许多人被困在废墟之中。
src: Strong aftershocks continue to plague the area and many are trapped in debris in the city of Palu.

ref: 但是，尽管同事们都在逃命，21 岁的阿贡 (Anthonius Gunawan Agung) 并没有离开自己的岗位，仍然坚守在巴鲁机场 (Mutiara Sis Al Jufri Airport) 摇摇欲坠的控制塔内。
src: But despite his colleagues fleeing for their lives, 21-year-old Anthonius Gunawan Agung refused to leave his post in the wildly swaying control tower at Mutiara Sis Al Jufri Airport Palu airport.

ref: 他坚持留在原地，以确保当时已经在跑道上的巴泽航空 6321 号航班能够安全起飞。
src: He stayed put to make sure that the Batik Air Flight 6321, which was on the runway at the time, was able to take off safely.

ref: 当他意识到控制塔开始崩塌后，从塔上跳了下来。
src: He then jumped off the traffic control tower when he thought it was collapsing.

ref: 随后在医院过世。
src: He died later in hospital.

ref: 据澳大利亚的美国广播公司新闻网 (ABC News) 报道，印尼空中导航公司 (Air Navigation Indonesia) 发言人尤哈尼斯?西拉伊特 (Yohannes Sirait) 表示，阿贡的这个决定挽救了数百人的性命。
src: Spokesman for Air Navigation Indonesia, Yohannes Sirait, said the decision may have saved hundreds of lives, Australia's ABC News reported.

ref: 我们已经准备好了一辆从加里曼丹巴厘巴板起飞的直升机，将阿贡送往其他城市的大医院进行治疗。
src: We prepared a helicopter from Balikpapan in Kalimantan to take him to a bigger hospital in another city.

ref: 但是，很遗憾，在直升机到达巴鲁之前，阿贡于今天早上离开了。
src: Unfortunately we lost him this morning before the helicopter reached Palu.

ref: “听闻这一消息，我们十分痛心”，西拉伊特补充到。
src: "Our heart breaks to hear about this," he added.

ref: 与此同时，印尼的国家减灾机构表示，通往栋加拉、西吉和 Boutong 等城镇的道路受阻，政府当局担心死亡人数可能会达到数千人。
src: Meanwhile, authorities fear that the death toll could reach the thousands with the country's disaster mitigation agency saying that access to the the towns of Donggala, Sigi and Boutong is limited.

ref: 机构发言人苏托波·普沃·努格罗霍 (Sutopo Purwo Nugroho) 表示，“我们相信死亡人数仍在上升，因为许多尸体仍埋在废墟下面，而且很多人还没有找到”。
src: "The toll is believed to be still increasing since many bodies were still under the wreckage while many have not able to be reached," agency spokesman Sutopo Purwo Nugroho said.

ref: 高达六米的海浪摧毁了本将于周六举行集体葬礼的巴鲁。
src: Waves that reached up to six meters have devastated Palu which will hold a mass burial on Sunday.

ref: 军用和商用飞机不断送来救援物资。
src: Military and commercial aircraft are bringing in aid and supplies.

ref: 一位 35 岁的母亲里萨·库祖玛 (Risa Kusuma) 告诉天空新闻台 (Sky News) 记者：“救护车每一分钟都会送来尸体。
src: Risa Kusuma, a 35-year-old mother, told Sky News: "Every minute an ambulance brings in bodies.

ref: 清洁的饮用水十分稀缺。
src: Clean water is scarce.

ref: 附近的小市场被洗劫一空。”
src: The mini-markets are looted everywhere."

ref: 印尼国际红十字会主席简·盖尔芬德 (Jan Gelfand) 向美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 透露：“印尼红十字会正在全力为幸存者提供帮助，但是我们不知道搜救人员会发现什么。
src: Jan Gelfand, head of the International Red Cross in Indonesia, told CNN: "The Indonesian Red Cross is racing to help survivors but we don't know what they'll find there.

ref: 虽然这已经是一场悲剧，但情况有可能会更糟糕”。
src: This is already a tragedy, but it could get much worse."

ref: 据 CNN 报道，印尼总统佐科·维多多 (Joko Widodo) 于周日抵达巴鲁，向印尼军队发表讲话：“我命令你们不舍昼夜地完成所有撤离相关任务。
src: Indonesia's President Joko Widodo arrived in Palu on Sunday and told the country's military: "I am asking all of you to work day and night to complete every tasks related to the evacuation.

ref: 你们准备好了吗？”。
src: Are you ready?" CNN reported.

ref: 印尼龙目岛早在今年年初便遭遇地震袭击，致使 550 多人丧生。
src: Indonesia was hit earlier this year by earthquakes in Lombok in which more than 550 people died.

ref: 密克罗尼西亚飞机失事：新几内亚航空公司 (Air Niugini) 称一名男子于飞机坠落环礁湖后失踪
src: Micronesia plane crash: Air Niugini now says one man missing after lagoon plane crash

ref: 一架新几内亚航空公司班机坠落到太平洋密克罗尼西亚的环礁湖，航空公司之前表示，机上 47 名乘客和机组人员，全部安全从沉入湖底的飞机中疏散出来，现称有一名男子失踪。
src: The airline operating a flight that crashed into a Pacific lagoon in Micronesia now says one man is missing, after earlier saying all 47 passengers and crew had safely evacuated the sinking plane.

ref: 新几内亚航空公司在周六下午的发布会上表示，无法对男性乘客的失踪作出解释。
src: Air Niugini said in a release that as of Saturday afternoon, it was unable to account for a male passenger.

ref: 该航空公司表示，正在与当地政府、医院和调查人员开展合作，寻找失踪男子的下落。
src: The airline said it was working with local authorities, hospitals and investigators to try to find the man.

ref: 该航空公司没有立即公布这名乘客的年龄、国籍等身份信息。
src: The airline did not immediately respond to requests for more details about the passenger, such as his age or nationality.

ref: 飞机在往楚克岛 (Chuuk Island) 机场降落时，撞到湖面，随后，当地船只参与救援，其他乘客和机组人员获救。
src: Local boats helped rescue the other passengers and crew after the plane hit the water while trying to land at the Chuuk Island airport.

ref: 周五，官方介绍称，有七人被送往医院。
src: Officials said on Friday that seven people had been taken to a hospital.

ref: 该航空公司周六表示，有六名乘客仍在医院接受治疗，所有乘客都处于稳定状态。
src: The airline said six passengers remained at the hospital Saturday, and all of them were in stable condition.

ref: 事故原因和事情发生的顺序尚不清楚。
src: What caused the crash and the exact sequence of events remains unclear.

ref: 该航空公司和美国海军均表示，飞机偏离跑道降落到了环礁湖中。
src: The airline and the U.S. Navy both said the plane landed in the lagoon short of the runway.

ref: 一些目击者认为，是飞机冲出了跑道。
src: Some witnesses thought the plane overshot the runway.

ref: 美国乘客 Bill Jaynes 称，这架飞机飞得很低。
src: American passenger Bill Jaynes said the plane came in very low.

ref: Jaynes 说道，“还好飞得低”。
src: "That's an extremely good thing," said Jaynes.

ref: Jaynes 介绍称，飞机沉水后，机内的水已经齐腰深，大家蹚水走到了紧急出口。
src: Jaynes said he and others managed to wade through waist-deep water to the emergency exits on the sinking plane.

ref: 他介绍道，乘务人员都惶恐不安，大喊大叫，自己的头部受了轻伤。
src: He said the flight attendants were panicking and yelling, and that he suffered a minor head injury.

ref: 美国海军称，附近正在改造码头的水手参与了救援，驾驶充气艇，将落水人员带到了岸边，而后飞机便沉没在了大约 30 米（100 英尺）深的水中。
src: The U.S. Navy said sailors working nearby on improving a wharf also helped in the rescue by using an inflatable boat to shuttle people ashore before the plane sank in about 30 meters (100 feet) of water.

ref: 航空安全网的数据显示，在过去二十年中，已有 111 人在巴布亚新几内亚国家航空公司注册的班机失事中丧生，但新几内亚航空公司尚无乘客死亡记录。
src: Data from the Aviation Safety Network indicates 111 people have died in crashes of PNG-registered airlines in the past two decades but none involved Air Niugini.

ref: 分析师列出了女子晚间被活活烧死的时间表
src: Analyst lays out timeline of night woman was burned alive

ref: 检方于周六重审被指控于 2014 年火烧密西西比州女子嫌犯。
src: The prosecution rested its case Saturday in the retrial of a man who is accused of burning a Mississippi woman alive in 2014.

ref: 美国司法部分析师保罗·罗莱特 (Paul Rowlett) 身为情报分析领域的专家鉴定人，做了数小时的证言陈述。
src: U.S. Department of Justice Analyst Paul Rowlett testified for hours as an expert witness in the field of intelligence analysis.

ref: 他向陪审团介绍了自己如何利用手机记录，将 29 岁的被告昆顿·特里斯 (Quinton Tellis)，与 19 岁的受害者杰西卡·钱波斯 (Jessica Chambers) 在案发当晚的活动拼凑在一起。
src: He outlined for the jury how he used cellphone records to piece together the movements of 29-year-old defendant Quinton Tellis and the 19-year-old victim, Jessica Chambers, on the night she died.

ref: 据《Clarion Ledger》报道，罗莱特介绍称，他收到几部手机的位置数据，数据显示在钱波斯去世当晚，特里斯与其在一起，而这与特里斯之前的说法相矛盾。
src: Rowlett said he received location data from several cellphones that showed Tellis was with Chambers the evening of her death, contradicting his previous claims, The Clarion Ledger reported .

ref: 特里斯称自己当时和他的朋友迈克尔·桑福德 (Michael Sanford) 在一起，而数据显示特里斯的手机与钱伯斯的手机当时处于同一个位置，于是，警察去找桑福德了解情况。
src: When data showed his cellphone was with Chambers' during the time he said he was with his friend Michael Sanford, police went to talk to Sanford.

ref: 桑福德周六出庭作证，称自己当天并不在城里。
src: Sanford took the stand Saturday and testified that he wasn't in town that day.

ref: 检察官询问桑福德，特里斯称自己案发当晚在桑福德的卡车上，情况是否属实。桑福德说特里斯在“撒谎，因为我的卡车当时在纳什维尔。”
src: When prosecutors asked if Tellis was telling the truth when he said he was in Sanford's truck that night, Sanford said he was "lying, because my truck was in Nashville."

ref: 另一个矛盾的地方是，特里斯称，钱伯斯去世时，他们俩已经认识大约两周了。
src: Another inconsistency was that Tellis said he had known Chambers for about two weeks when she died.

ref: 而手机记录表明，他们才刚刚认识一周而已。
src: Cellphone records indicated they'd only known each other for a week.

ref: 罗莱特称，在钱伯斯去世后的某个时间，特里斯删除了手机中钱伯斯的短信、电话和联系信息。
src: Rowlett said that sometime after Chambers' death, Tellis deleted Chambers' texts, calls and contact information from his phone.

ref: Hale 称，“他将她从生活中抹掉，抹除得干干净净”。
src: "He erased her from his life," Hale said.

ref: 被告定于周日开始最后论述。
src: The defense is scheduled to begin its closing arguments Sunday.

ref: 法官称，希望当天晚些时候，将审判送往陪审团。
src: The judge said he expected the trial to go to the jury later that day.

ref: High Breed 嘻哈组合：什么是意识嘻哈？
src: The High Breed: What is conscious hip hop?

ref: 嘻哈三人组希望给自己的歌曲注入积极的信息，改变人们对嘻哈音乐的负面看法。
src: A hip hop trio wants to challenge the negative view of the genre by filling their music with positive messages.

ref: High Breed 嘻哈组合来自于布里斯托尔。他们称，嘻哈音乐最初在歌曲中说唱政治内容，解决社会问题，但如今已脱离这种形式。
src: The High Breed, from Bristol, claim hip hop moved away from its origins of political messages and tackling social issues.

ref: 他们希望追本溯源，让意识嘻哈再次流行。
src: They want to go back to its roots and make conscious hip hop popular again.

ref: 嘻哈组合 The Fugees 和 Common 等最近凭借 Akala 和 Lowkey 等艺人的表现，已在英国再度崛起。
src: Artists like The Fugees and Common have seen a recent resurgence in the UK through artists such as Akala and Lowkey.

ref: 又是个黑人？！
src: Another black person?!

ref: 收到“种族歧视”短信后被解雇，纽约一保姆将雇主夫妇告上法庭
src: NY nanny sues couple over firing after "racist" text

ref: 纽约一保姆因错误接收发送自孩子母亲抱怨称“又是个黑人”的短信后被炒，一举将夫妇二人告上法庭称其“宗族歧视”。
src: A New York nanny is suing a couple for discriminatory firing after receiving a misdirected text from the mother complaining that she was "another black person."

ref: 夫妇二人拒绝承认种族歧视，称此案件为“勒索”。
src: The couple deny they are racist, likening the suit to "extortion."

ref: 2016 年，两个孩子的母亲，弗拉克斯曼 (Lynsey Plasco-Flaxman)，在儿童保育提供者吉赛尔·莫里斯 (Giselle Maurice) 上岗前发现对方为黑人后，表示很失望。
src: Lynsey Plasco-Flaxman, a mother of two, expressed dismay when finding out that the new child care provider, Giselle Maurice, was black upon arriving for her first day of work in 2016.

ref: “不~~~~~~~~~~~又是个黑人”，在给丈夫弗拉克斯曼的短信中写到。
src: "NOOOOOOOOOOO ANOTHER BLACK PERSON," wrote Mrs Plasco-Flaxman to her husband in a text.

ref: 然而，短信却两次错误地传给了莫里斯。
src: However, instead of sending it to her husband, she sent it to Ms. Maurice, twice.

ref: 据《纽约邮报》报道，在意识到失态后，“感觉尴尬的”弗拉克斯曼太太解雇了莫里斯，理由是即将离职的非裔美国人保姆干得不好，而她在等待一名菲律宾人。
src: After realizing her gaffe, an "uncomfortable" Plasco-Flaxman fired Ms. Maurice, stating that their outgoing nanny, who was African-American, had done a bad job and that she was instead expecting a Filipino, according to the New York Post.

ref: 弗拉克斯曼太太向莫里斯支付了一天的工资，然后叫了辆优步车送她回家。
src: Ms. Maurice was paid for her one day of work and then sent home for an Uber.

ref: 日前，莫里斯正在起诉这对夫妇，要求他们为这份最初雇用时承诺住在雇主家长达六个月的临时工作，支付每日高达 350 美元的赔偿金，尽管没有合同可依。
src: Now, Maurice is suing the couple for compensation over the firing, and is seeking compensation to the tune of $350 a day for the six-month, live-in gig she had initially been hired to do, albeit without a contract.

ref: 周五，莫里斯告诉《纽约邮报》记者，“我想告诉他们，看，你们不会那么做”，并补充到“我知道这就是种族歧视”。
src: "I want to show them, look, you don't do stuff like that," she told the Post on Friday, adding "I know it's discrimination."

ref: 这对夫妇反驳控诉称他们没有种族歧视，表示终止对莫里斯的雇用是完全合理的行为，他们担心被冒犯以后无法相信她。
src: The couple have hit back at the claims that they are racist, saying that terminating Maurice's employment was the reasonable thing to do, fearing they could not trust her after offending her.

ref: “我妻子无意将一些信息发给了她。
src: "My wife had sent her something that she didn't mean to say.

ref: 她没有种族歧视。
src: She's not a racist.

ref: 我们都没有种族歧视”，丈夫 Joel Plasco 告诉《纽约邮报》记者。
src: We're not racist people," husband Joel Plasco told the Post.

ref: “但是你会放心把孩子交给自己曾经冒犯过的人吗，即便是无意之举？
src: "But would you put your children in the hands of someone you've been rude to, even if it was by mistake?

ref: 你刚刚出生的孩子？
src: Your newborn baby?

ref: 拜托，大概谁都不会吧。”
src: Come on."

ref: Plasco 称此案件为“勒索”，表示她的妻子两个月前生下孩子，目前“处境非常困难”。
src: Likening the suit to "extortion," Plasco said his wife was just two months off having a baby and was in a "very difficult situation."

ref: “你会雇用那样的人吗？
src: "You're going to go after someone like that?

ref: 那可不是明智之举”，这位投资银行家补充到。
src: That's not a very nice thing to do," the investment banker added.

ref: 虽然案件目前仍在审理之中，但舆论法庭已经迅速开始在社交媒体上对这对夫妇的行为和逻辑展开谴责。
src: While the legal case is still ongoing, the court of public opinion has been quick to denounce the couple on social media, slamming them for their behavior and logic.

ref: 最新信件透露，帕丁顿熊出版商担心读者无法接受一只会说话的熊
src: Paddington publishers feared readers wouldn't relate to a talking bear, new letter reveals

ref: 在这本书被读者们接受后不久出生的邦德 (Bond) 的女儿凯伦·扬克尔 (Karen Jankel) 在信中透露：“在这本书出版之前，人们很难设身处地地想象第一次阅读本书的读者的感受。
src: Bond's daughter Karen Jankel, who was born shortly after the book was accepted, said of the letter: "It's hard to put oneself in the shoes of somebody reading it for the first time before it was published.

ref: 现在帕丁顿熊却取得了巨大的成功，真的很好笑。”
src: It's very amusing knowing now what we know about Paddington's huge success."

ref: 说到父亲，她说父亲曾是英国广播公司 (BBC) 的一名摄影师，后来受到一只玩具小熊的启发写下了这本儿童读物，他始终对自己屡屡被拒的作品充满希望，她补充到，父亲于去年去世，这本书出版的 60 周年纪念可谓是“苦乐参半”。
src: Saying her father, who had worked as a BBC cameraman before being inspired to write the children's book by a small toy bear, would have been sanguine about his work being rejected, she added the 60th anniversary of the books publication was "bittersweet" after his death last year.

ref: 说到帕丁顿熊，她说那是“我们家非常重要的一员”，她还说她的父亲为自己最终取得的成功感到骄傲。
src: Of Paddington, whom she describes as a "very important member of our family," she added her father was quietly proud of his eventual success.

ref: “父亲是一个很安静的人，从不自吹自擂”，她说。
src: "He was quite a quiet man, and he wasn't a boastful person," she said.

ref: “但是因为帕丁顿熊对他来说是太过真实，就像你的孩子取得了成就：你为他们感到骄傲，尽管那成就并不属于你。
src: "But because Paddington was so real to him, it was almost like if you have a child who achieves something: you're proud of them even though it's not your doing really.

ref: 我想他正是如此看待帕丁顿熊的成功。
src: I think he viewed Paddington's success sort of in that way.

ref: 虽然这是他的创作和想象力的结晶，但他总是把成功归因于帕丁顿熊自身。
src: Although it was his creation and his imagination, he always used to give the credit to Paddington himself."

ref: 我女儿奄奄一息，我不得不在电话里跟她道别
src: My daughter was dying and I had to say goodbye over the phone

ref: 飞机着陆后，她的女儿被紧急送往尼斯的路易·巴斯德 (Louis Pasteur) 2 医院，最终医生们没能挽回她的生命。
src: On landing her daughter had been rushed to Nice's Hospital Louis Pasteur 2, where doctors worked in vain to save her life.

ref: “纳德 (Nad) 照常打电话来，说情况很糟糕，她没想到会这样”，Ednan-Laperouse 太太说到。
src: "Nad was calling regularly to say it was really bad, that she wasn't expected to make it," said Mrs Ednan-Laperouse.

ref: “然后我接到了纳德 (Nad) 的电话，说我女儿只剩几分钟的时间了，我不得不在电话里跟她道别。
src: "Then I got the call from Nad to say she was going to die within the next two minutes and I had to say goodbye to her.

ref: 我照做了。
src: And I did.

ref: 我说“亲爱的扎西，我很爱你。
src: I said, "Tashi, I love you so much, darling.

ref: 我很快就会去陪你。
src: I'll be with you soon.

ref: 我会一直陪着你。
src: I'll be with you.

ref: 医生给她服用的维持心跳的药物逐渐失效。
src: The drugs doctors had given her to keep her heart pumping were slowly petering out and leaving her system.

ref: 她提前去世了，一切都结束了。
src: She had died some time before hand and this was it all shutting down.

ref: 知道这一切已经发生了，我只能坐在那里等待。
src: I had to just sit there and wait, knowing this was all unfolding.

ref: 我不能咆哮、尖叫或哭泣，因为我的家人和朋友都在我周围。
src: I couldn't howl or scream or cry because I was in a situation surrounded by families and people.

ref: 我必须保持冷静。”
src: I had to really hold it together."

ref: 最终正沉浸在丧女之痛中的 Ednan-Laperouse 太太，与其他乘客一同登上了飞机，冷静地似乎忘记了她正在经历的磨难。
src: Eventually Mrs Ednan-Laperouse, by now grieving for the loss of her daughter, boarded the plane alongside the other passengers - oblivious to the ordeal she was going through.

ref: “没有人能体会到”，她说到。
src: "No-one knew," she said.

ref: “我低下头，眼泪止不住地往下流。
src: "I had my head down, and tears were falling the whole time.

ref: 我知道这很难解释，但就是在飞机上，我对纳德 (Nad) 产生了强烈的同情。
src: It's hard to explain, but it was on the flight I felt this overwhelming sense of sympathy for Nad.

ref: 他需要我的理解和关爱。
src: That he needed my love and understanding.

ref: 我知道他有多爱自己的女儿。”
src: I knew how much he loved her."

ref: 悲伤女子张贴卡片，劝解有轻生念头者回心转意
src: Grieving women post cards to prevent suicides on bridge

ref: 两名失去至亲的女人努力阻止其他人自杀。
src: Two women who lost loved ones to suicide are working to prevent others from taking their own lives.

ref: Sharon Davis 和 Kelly Humphreys 一直在威尔士桥上张贴卡片，卡片上写着激励的文字，还有电话号码，方便有需要的人获得支持。
src: Sharon Davis and Kelly Humphreys have been posting cards on a Welsh bridge with inspirational messages and phone numbers that people can call for support.

ref: Davis 夫人的儿子 Tyler 在 13 岁那年，患上了抑郁症，18 岁时自杀身亡。
src: Ms Davis' son Tyler was 13 when he began suffering with depression and killed himself aged 18.

ref: “我不想再有别的父母经历我每天都在承受的痛苦”，她说道。
src: "I don't want any parent to feel the way I have to feel everyday," she said.

ref: Davis 夫人家住 Lydney，今年 45 岁，她的儿子是一位前途无量的厨师，脸上总是挂着有感染力的笑容。
src: Ms Davis, aged 45, who lives in Lydney, said her son was a promising chef with an infectious grin.

ref: “大家都知道他是个爱笑的人。
src: "Everyone knew him for his smile.

ref: 人们总是说，他的笑能让满屋子的人都高兴起来。”
src: They always said his smile lit up any room."

ref: 可是，他放弃了工作，不久便离世了，他去了“一个特别黑暗的地方”。
src: However, he gave up work before he died, as he was "in a really dark place."

ref: 2014 年，Tyler 的弟弟当时刚刚满 11 岁，就是他发现了 Tyler 结束了自己的生命。
src: In 2014, Tyler's brother, who was 11 at the time, was the one to find his sibling after he had taken his own life.

ref: Davis 说道：“我一直担心，他的自杀会产生连带反应。”
src: Ms Davis said: "I continually worry that there's going to be a knock on effect."

ref: 于是 Davis 制作了卡片，“希望人们知道，有人愿意帮你，愿意聆听你的倾诉，即使我们是朋友也没关系。
src: Ms Davis created the cards, "to let people know there are people out there that you can go to and you can talk to, even if it's a friend.

ref: 不要沉默不语，你需要倾诉。”
src: Don't sit in silence - you need to talk."

ref: Humphreys 夫人是 Davies 夫人多年的朋友，在母亲去世不久，她的丈夫也离开了自己，如今已经有 15 年的光景了。
src: Ms Humphreys, who has been friends with Ms Davies for years, lost Mark, her partner of 15 years, not long after the death of his mother.

ref: 她介绍称，“他从没有跟我们说过，感觉情绪低落或是抑郁寡欢什么的。
src: "He didn't say that he was feeling down or depressed or anything," she said.

ref: 就在圣诞前几天，我们注意到，他的情绪不太对。
src: "A couple of days before Christmas we noticed his change in attitude.

ref: 圣诞节当天，孩子们打开自己的礼物，他也没有什么眼神交流之类的，当时他的情绪已经跌入了最低谷。”
src: He was at rock bottom on Christmas Day - when the kids opened their presents he didn't make eye contact with them or anything."

ref: 她说，丈夫的死给他们带来了巨大的创伤，可他们还得继续生活下去：“他死后，家里的天都塌了。
src: She said his death was a huge trauma to them, but they have to work through it: "It rips a hole through the family.

ref: 我们大家都悲痛欲绝。
src: It tears us apart.

ref: 可是我们还是得继续生活，继续战斗。”
src: But we've all got to carry on and fight."

ref: 如果你有什么难言的困难，可以免费致电 116 123（英国和爱尔兰）联系 Samaritans，发送电子邮件至 @samaritans.org，或者访问 Samaritans 网站。
src: If you are struggling to cope, you can call Samaritans free on 116 123 (UK and Ireland), email jo@samaritans.org, or visit the Samaritans website here.

ref: 联邦调查局 (FBI) 展开调查，布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh) 前途未卜
src: Brett Kavanaugh's future hangs in the balance as FBI begins investigation

ref: “我想，如果我们能够真正得到他想要的东西 - 一项在时间、范围上都很受限的调查 - 那么或许我们还能挽回一丝团结”，弗雷克 (Flake) 于周六表示，他补充称，自己担心委员会会借此机会“开始瓦解”根深蒂固的党派僵局。
src: "I thought, if we could actually get something like what he was asking for - an investigation limited in time, limited in scope - we could maybe bring a little unity," said Mr Flake on Saturday, adding that he feared the committee was "falling apart" amid entrenched partisan gridlock.

ref: 为什么卡瓦诺及其共和党支持者们不希望联邦调查局 (FBI) 进行调查呢？
src: Why didn't Mr Kavanaugh and his Republican supporters want the FBI to investigate?

ref: 他们的不情愿完全是因为时机问题。
src: Their reluctance is all due to timing.

ref: 距离 11 月 6 日的中期选举只剩下 5 周的时间，如果如我们所料，共和党表现不佳，那么他们尝试推举美国最高法院候选人的努力将受到重创。
src: The midterm elections are only five weeks away, on November 6 - if, as expected, the Republicans do badly, then they will be severely weakened in their attempts to get the man they want elected to the highest court in the land.

ref: 乔治·W·布什 (George W. Bush) 一直不停致电参议员们，试图游说他们支持卡瓦诺，因为卡瓦诺曾在白宫为布什政府效力，并通过布什结识了他的妻子，布什的私人秘书阿什利 (Ashley)。
src: George W. Bush has been picking up the phone to call Senators, lobbying them to support Mr Kavanaugh, who worked in the White House for Mr Bush and through him met his wife Ashley, who was Mr Bush's personal secretary.

ref: 联邦调查局 (FBI) 发布报告后会怎样？
src: What happens after the FBI produces its report?

ref: 参议院将进行投票，目前参议院有 51 个共和党席位和 49 民主党席位。
src: There will be a vote in the Senate, where 51 Republicans and 49 Democrats currently sit.

ref: 目前尚不清楚，卡瓦诺能否在参议院获得至少 50 票的支持，以打破与副总统迈克·彭斯 (Mike Pence) 之间的平局，从而确认最高法院候选人的提名。
src: It's still not clear whether Mr Kavanaugh can get to at least 50 votes on the Senate floor, which would allow Mike Pence, the vice president, to break a tie and confirm him to the Supreme Court.

ref: 金正恩政权下的朝鲜叛逃人数“下降”
src: North Korea defector numbers 'drop' under Kim

ref: 韩国的一位立法者表示，自七年前金正恩上台以来，叛逃到韩国的朝鲜人数量下降。
src: The number of North Korean defectors to South Korea has fallen since Kim Jong-un came to power seven years ago, a South Korean lawmaker has said.

ref: Park Byeong-seug 援引韩国统一部的数据称，去年总计 1,127 名朝鲜人叛逃到韩国，而 2011 年，总计有 2,706 名。
src: Park Byeong-seug, citing data from the South's unification ministry, said there had been 1,127 defections last year - compared with 2,706 in 2011.

ref: Park 先生表示，叛逃人数减少的关键原因是朝鲜与中国边境管制的加强，以及人口走私团伙收取的费用增长。
src: Mr Park said tighter border controls between North Korea and China and higher rates charged by people smugglers were key factors.

ref: 朝鲜没有公开发表评论。
src: Pyongyang has made no public comments.

ref: 绝大多数叛逃到韩国的朝鲜人，最终都能获得韩国公民身份。
src: The vast majority of defectors from the North are eventually offered South Korean citizenship.

ref: 韩国表示，自 1953 年朝鲜战争结束以来，已有 30,000 多名朝鲜人非法越过边界来到韩国。
src: Seoul says more than 30,000 North Koreans have illegally crossed the border since the end of the Korean War in 1953.

ref: 多数叛逃者系经由中国逃到朝鲜，因为朝鲜同中国的边界线最长，而且比朝韩两国之间严加防守的非军事区 (DMZ) 更容易越过。
src: Most flee via China, which has the longest border with North Korea and is easier to cross than the heavily protected Demilitarised Zone (DMZ) between the two Koreas.

ref: 中国认为叛逃者为非法移民，而非难民，所以常常会将其强行遣返回国。
src: China regards the defectors as illegal migrants rather than refugees and often forcibly repatriates them.

ref: 最近几个月，朝鲜与韩国两国之间的关系，显著改善，虽然从技术上来讲，仍处于战争状态。
src: Relations between the North and the South - who are still technically at war - have markedly improved in recent months.

ref: 本月初，两国领导人在平壤举行会谈，就陷入僵局的无核化谈判展开对话。
src: Earlier this month, the leaders of the two countries met in Pyongyang for talks that centred on the stalled denuclearisation negotiations.

ref: 两国关系的改善得益于 6 月美国总统唐纳德·特朗普与金正恩在新加坡举行的历史性会晤，会晤期间，双方大体同意在朝着朝鲜半岛无核化的方向努力。
src: This came after June's historic meeting between US President Donald Trump and Kim Jong-un in Singapore, when they agreed in broad terms to work towards the nuclear-free Korean peninsula.

ref: 但周六，朝鲜外务相李勇浩指责称，自会晤结束之后，并未取得进展，因为美国仍在实施制裁。
src: But on Saturday, North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong-ho blamed US sanctions for the lack of progress since then.

ref: “如果美国不值得信赖，那我们就无法确保本国安全能够得到保障，因此我们绝对不可能单方面解除核武器”，李勇浩在纽约举行的联合国大会上发表讲话这样介绍道。
src: "Without any trust in the US, there will be no confidence in our national security and under such circumstances, there is no way we will unilaterally disarm ourselves first," Mr Ri said in a speech to the UN General Assembly in New York.

ref: Nancy Pelosi 称 Brett Kavanaugh“歇斯底里”，不适合担任最高法院法官之职
src: Nancy Pelosi calls Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical," says he is unfit to serve on the Supreme Court

ref: 众议院少数党领袖南希·佩洛西 (Nancy Pelosi) 称，最高法院提名人布雷特·卡瓦诺 (Brett Kavanaugh)“歇斯底里”，脾气不适合担任最高法院法官之职。
src: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi called Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh "hysterical" and said that he was temperamentally unfit to serve on the Supreme Court.

ref: 佩洛西在周六于德克萨斯州奥斯汀 (Austin) 举办的得克萨斯论坛 (Texas Tribune Festival ) 上接受采访时，这样评价道。
src: Pelosi made the comments in an interview Saturday at the Texas Tribune Festival in Austin, Texas.

ref: “我忍不住想，如果一个女人有这样的行为，他们会用'歇斯底里'来形容，”佩洛西此番言论，针对的是周四卡瓦诺在参议院司法委员会所做的证言陈述。
src: "I couldn't help but think that if a woman had ever performed that way, they would say 'hysterical,'" Pelosi said about her reaction to Kavanaugh's testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Thursday.

ref: 卡瓦诺情绪失控，针对克里斯汀·布莱西·福特 (Christine Blasey Ford) 博士所提出的控告，他称自己年少时没有性侵过年少时的福特。
src: Kavanaugh emotionally denied allegations that he had sexually assaulted Dr. Christine Blasey Ford when they were both teenagers.

ref: 卡瓦诺在他的开场发言中，情绪失控，在讨论自己的家庭和高中生活时，几次几乎是在喊叫，甚至说不出话来。
src: During his opening statement, Kavanaugh was very emotional, at times nearly shouting and choking up while discussing his family and his high school years.

ref: 他还明确谴责与会的民主党人，称这一指控是由自由党组织的一次“怪诞联合式人身攻击”，因为自由党对希拉里·克林顿 (Hillary Clinton) 败选 2016 年总统大选而心怀愤恨。
src: He also explicitly condemned Democrats on the committee, calling the allegations against him a "grotesque and coordinated character assassination" organized by liberals angry that Hillary Clinton lost the 2016 presidential election.

ref: 佩洛西称，她相信卡瓦诺的证词证明，他无法胜任最高法院的职位，因为这表明，他对民主党人有偏见。
src: Pelosi said that she believed Kavanaugh's testimony proved that he could not serve on the Supreme Court, because it showed that he is biased against Democrats.

ref: 她说：“我觉得他的那些证言，还有他对克林顿和民主党人的态度，说明他资格不够”。
src: "I think that he disqualifies himself with those statements and the manner in which he went after the Clintons and the Democrats," she said.

ref: 在被问及，如果最终证实卡瓦诺罪名成立，如果民主党在众议院获得多数席位，是否会弹劾卡瓦诺时，佩洛西表示异议。
src: Pelosi demurred when asked if she would try to impeach Kavanaugh if he is confirmed, and if Democrats gain the majority in the House of Representatives.

ref: 佩洛西说道：“这样说吧，如果他对国会或者 FBI 说的并非事实，那么他不光是不适合担任最高法院之职，而且还不配在现在就职的法庭任职”。
src: "I will say this -- if he is not telling the truth to Congress or to the FBI, then he's not fit not only to be on the Supreme Court, but to be on the court he's on right now," Pelosi said.

ref: 卡瓦诺目前是华盛顿 DC 巡回上诉法院的法官。
src: Kavanaugh is currently a judge on the D.C. Circuit Court of Appeals.

ref: 佩洛西补充说，作为一名民主党人，自己担心卡瓦诺可能会对“平价医疗法案” (Affordable Care Act) 或 “罗诉韦德案”(Roe v. Wade) 作出否定裁决，因为他属于保守派司法官。
src: Pelosi added that as a Democrat she was concerned about potential Kavanaugh rulings against the Affordable Care Act or Roe v. Wade, as he is considered to be a conservative justice.

ref: 卡瓦诺在确认听证会，回避了自己是否会推翻某些最高法院裁决的问题。
src: In his confirmation hearings, Kavanaugh sidestepped questions on whether he would overturn certain Supreme Court decisions.

ref: “现在，不适合让一个歇斯底里、心怀偏见的人到法院任职，还希望我们说一句'这不是很好吗’”，佩洛西这样说道。
src: "It's not time for a hysterical, biased person to go to the court and expect us to say, 'isn't that wonderful,'" Pelosi said.

ref: 妇女需要行使自己的权力。
src: And Women Need to Wield It.

ref: 那是一次正义的诽谤，长达数月、甚至数年的愤怒不断蔓延，如果不哭出来，她将无法摆脱。
src: It is a righteous diatribe, months and years of fury spilling over, and she can't get it out without weeping.

ref: 斯泰纳姆 (Steinem ) 45 年后对我说，“我们生气的时候会哭”。
src: "We cry when we get angry," Ms. Steinem said to me 45 years later.

ref: “我认为这很正常，你觉得呢？”
src: "I don't think that's uncommon, do you?"

ref: 她继续道，“一位女士给予了我很大的帮助，她是某家公司的主管，她说她生气的时候也会哭，但是她发现了一个诀窍，那就是当她气得开始哭的时候，她会向与她对话的人诉说”，你就会知道我很难过，因为我哭了。
src: She continued, "I was greatly helped by a woman who was an executive someplace, who said she also cried when she got angry, but developed a technique which meant that when she got angry and started to cry, she'd say to the person she was talking to, "You may think I am sad because I am crying.

ref: 我在生气。“
src: I am angry."

ref: 然后她继续到。
src: And then she just kept going.

ref: 我觉得这简直太棒了。”
src: And I thought that was brilliant."

ref: 我们之所以用眼泪来发泄愤怒，部分原因是因为我们从根本上误解了眼泪。
src: Tears are permitted as an outlet for wrath in part because they are fundamentally misunderstood.

ref: 我印象最深刻的一件事是在我早年的一份工作中，那是一家男性占主导地位的公司，有一次我因为无法形容的愤怒而哭泣，然后我被一个老女人（一个我对她一直有些畏惧的冷漠的经理）抓住后颈，她把我拖进了楼梯间。
src: One of my sharpest memories from an early job, in a male-dominated office, where I once found myself weeping with inexpressible rage, was my being grabbed by the scruff of my neck by an older woman - a chilly manager of whom I'd always been slightly terrified - who dragged me into a stairwell.

ref: 她警告我说“永远也不要让他们看到你哭”。
src: "Never let them see you crying," she told me.

ref: “他们不知道你在生气。
src: "They don't know you're furious.

ref: 他们会认为你很难过，并为此感到高兴，因为他们打败了你。”
src: They think you're sad and will be pleased because they got to you."

ref: 时任科罗拉多州民主党国会女议员的帕特丽夏·施罗德 (Patricia Schroeder) 曾与加里·哈特 (Gary Hart) 一同参加总统竞选。
src: Patricia Schroeder, then a Democratic congresswoman from Colorado, had worked with Gary Hart on his presidential runs.

ref: 1987 年，哈特因在一艘名为“Monkey 商务晚餐船”的船上卷入一场婚外情而退出竞选，施罗德十分沮丧，认为自己应该亲自实践竞选总统的这一想法。
src: In 1987, when Mr. Hart was caught in an extramarital affair aboard a boat called Monkey Business and bowed out of the race, Ms. Schroeder, deeply frustrated, figured there was no reason she shouldn't explore the idea of running for president herself.

ref: “那并不是一个经过深思熟虑的决定”，30 年后她笑着对我说。
src: "It was not a well-thought-out decision," she said to me with a laugh 30 years later.

ref: “当时已经有七位其他候选人参加竞选，而他们也不那么需要另外一位候选人。
src: "There were already seven other candidates in the race, and the last thing they needed was another one.

ref: 有人将这称为‘白雪公主和七个小矮人’。”
src: Somebody called it "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.""

ref: 因为已经进入竞选后期，施罗德在募集资金方面较为落后，因此她发誓除非筹集到 200 万美元，否则决不参加竞选。
src: Because it was late in the campaign, she was behind on fund-raising, and so she vowed that she wouldn't enter the race unless she raised $2 million.

ref: 这无疑是一场必败之战。
src: It was a losing battle.

ref: 她发现，一些支持者为男性竞选者捐赠了 1,000 美元，却只给了她 250 美元。
src: She discovered that some of her supporters who gave $1,000 to men would give her only $250.

ref: “他们认为我需要折扣吗？”，施罗德怀疑到。
src: "Do they think I get a discount?" she wondered.

ref: 当她发表演讲宣布不会发起正式的竞选活动时，她被各种复杂的情绪所困扰 - 对支持者的感激；对令她难以筹集资金和难以瞄准目标投票者而非代表的体制的失望；以及对性别歧视的愤怒 - 她开始哽咽。
src: When she made her speech announcing that she would not launch a formal campaign, she was so overcome by emotions - gratitude for the people who'd supported her, frustration with the system that made it so difficult to raise money and to target voters rather than delegates, and anger at the sexism - that she got choked up.

ref: 施罗德回忆起媒体对她的反应时说道，“你应该会认为我精神崩溃了”。
src: "You would have thought I'd had a nervous breakdown," recalled Ms. Schroeder about how the press reacted to her.

ref: “你可能会想到克里奈克斯 (Kleenex) 是我的企业赞助商。
src: "You'd have thought Kleenex was my corporate sponsor.

ref: 我记得当时我在想，他们会在我的墓碑上刻下什么?
src: I remember thinking, what are they going to put on my tombstone?

ref: ‘她哭了’？”
src: "She cried"?""

ref: 中美贸易战将为北京方面带来哪些利益
src: How the US-China trade war may be good for Beijing

ref: 专业人士表示，美中贸易战的开火声势浩大，尽管战争才刚刚开始，但从长远来看，两国之间的分歧可能对北京方面较为有利。
src: The opening salvos of the trade war between the US and China were deafening, and while the battle is far from over, a rift between the countries may be beneficial to Beijing in the long term, experts say.

ref: 今年年初，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 首次警告称，即将对中国的主要出口产品征税，包括太阳能电池板、钢铁和铝。
src: Donald Trump, the US President, fired the first warning earlier this year by taxing key Chinese exports including solar panels, steel and aluminium.

ref: 贸易战本周发生严重升级，新的关税将对中国入口美国的一半商品征税，影响波及价值 2000 亿美元（1500 亿欧元）的商品。
src: The most significant escalation rolled in this week with new tariffs affecting $200 billion (£150 billion) worth of items, effectively taxing half of all goods coming into the US from China.

ref: 北京方面每次都以同样的方式进行报复，最近一次对价值 600 亿美元的美国商品提高了 5% 至 10% 的关税。
src: Beijing has retaliated each time in kind, most recently slapping tariffs of five to ten per cent on $60 billion of American goods.

ref: 中国已承诺与美国对抗到底，全球第二大经济体绝不会在短期内退缩。
src: China has pledged to match the US shot-for-shot, and the world's second largest economy is unlikely to blink anytime soon.

ref: 让华盛顿方面做出让步意味着需要满足他们的要求，但公开向美国屈服对中国国家主席习近平来说实在过于难堪。
src: Getting Washington to back down means caving into demands, but publicly bowing to the US would be far too embarrassing for Xi Jinping, China's president.

ref: 尽管如此，专业人士表示，如果北京方面能打好这手牌，那么美国贸易战的压力可能会降低两国经济的相互依赖程度，为中国带来长期的积极支持。
src: Still, experts say if Beijing can play its cards right, US trade war pressures could positively support China over the long term by lowering the inter-dependence of the two economies.

ref: 新美国安全中心 (Center for New American Security) 智库一位亚洲领域的助理研究员，阿比盖尔·格雷斯 (Abigail Grace) 表示，“如果华盛顿或北京方面快速做出政治决策，那么可能会导致两国引发经济混乱，这实际上比此前已经获得认可的坐视不管的境遇更加危险”。
src: "The fact that a quick political decision in either Washington or Beijing could create the conditions that start an economic tailspin in either country is actually a lot more dangerous than onlookers have acknowledged before," said Abigail Grace, a research associate who focuses on Asia at the Center for New American Security, a think tank.

ref: 外交部长说称叙利亚已“准备好”迎接难民回国
src: Syria 'ready' for refugees to return, says Foreign Minister

ref: 叙利亚表示，已准备好让难民自愿回国，并呼吁各界人士，帮助其重建饱受七年多战争之苦的家园。
src: Syria says it's ready for the voluntary return of refugees and is appealing for help to rebuild the country devastated by a more than seven-year long war.

ref: 外交部长 Walid al-Moualem 在联合国大会上表示，叙利亚的条件正在好转。
src: Speaking to the United Nations General Assembly, Foreign minister Walid al-Moualem said conditions in the country are improving.

ref: “由于在打击恐怖主义工作上取得了进展，如今，地面上趋于稳定，更安全”，他说道。
src: "Today the situation on the ground is more stable and secure thanks to progress made in combating terrorism," he said.

ref: 叙利亚政府仍将对恐怖分子摧毁的地区进行修复，使其恢复正常。
src: The government continues to rehabilitate the areas destroyed by terrorists to restore normalcy.

ref: 目前，迎接难民自愿回国的所有条件都已准备好。出境逃亡的难民因恐怖主义以及针对日常生活和生计的单方面经济措施，都是被迫无奈，不得不离开的家园。
src: All conditions are now present for the voluntary return of refugees to the country they had to leave because of terrorism and the unilateral economic measures that targeted their daily lives and their livelihoods.

ref: 据联合国估计，自 2011 年战争爆发以来，已有逾 550 万叙利亚人逃离出境。
src: The UN estimates that more than 5.5 million Syrians have fled the country since the war began in 2011.

ref: 而留在叙利亚的其他 600 万人，仍需要人道主义援助。
src: Another six million people still living in the country are in need of humanitarian assistance.

ref: Al-Moualem 表示，叙利亚政权欢迎其他国家援助其重建饱受蹂躏的家园。
src: Al-Moualem said the Syrian regime would welcome help in rebuilding the devastated country.

ref: 但他强调，不会接受有条件的援助或支援叛乱活动国家的帮助。
src: But he stressed that it would not accept conditional assistance or help from countries that sponsored the insurgency.

ref: 欧洲队夺得巴黎莱德杯的胜利
src: Europe clinches Ryder Cup victory in Paris

ref: 在法国巴黎郊外的国家高尔夫球场 (Le Golf National) 举行的 2018 年莱德杯比赛中，欧洲队以 16.5 比 10.5 的最终成绩，击败美国队。
src: Team Europe has won the 2018 Ryder Cup defeating Team USA by a final score of 16.5 to 10.5 at Le Golf National outside Paris, France.

ref: 美国现已连续六次在欧洲土地上失利，自 1993 年以来，一直没有在欧洲赢得过莱德杯。
src: The US has now lost six consecutive times on European soil and has not won a Ryder Cup in Europe since 1993.

ref: 丹麦队队长托马斯·比约恩 (Thomas Bjorn) 的球队率先拿到了击败美国所需的 14.5 分，欧洲重新获得了冠军。
src: Europe regained the crown as the Danish captain Thomas Bjorn's team reached the 14.5 points they required to beat the United States.

ref: 美国球星菲尔·米克尔森 (Phil Mickelson) 在比赛的大部分比赛中挣扎，他在第 16 洞，第三杆击球下水后，直接向弗朗西斯科·莫利纳里 (Francesco Molinari) 认输。
src: US star Phil Mickelson, who struggled most of the tournament, plunked his tee-shot into the water at the par-3 16th hole, conceding his match to Francesco Molinari.

ref: 意大利高尔夫球手莫利纳里 (Molinari) 在所有轮次中都大放异彩，成为自锦标赛以当前的形式于 1979 年开始以来，四个打出了 5-0-0 的成绩的球员之一。
src: The Italian golfer Molinari shined in all of his rounds, becoming 1-of-4 players to ever go 5-0-0 since the tournament's current format begun in 1979.

ref: 美国选手乔斯·斯皮斯 (Jordan Spieth) 被欧洲队排名最低的球员丹麦的托尔比约恩·奥莱森 (Thorbjorn Olesen) 以5 比 4 战败。
src: American Jordan Spieth was blown out 5&4 by the lowest-ranked player on the European team, Thorbjorn Olesen of Denmark.

ref: 世界排名第一的球员达斯汀·约翰逊 (Dustin Johnson) 以 2 比 1 落后于英格兰的伊恩·保尔特 (Ian Poulter)，有望参加他最后一场莱德杯比赛。
src: The world's top-ranked player, Dustin Johnson, fell 2 and 1 to Ian Poulter of England who may have played in his final Ryder Cup.

ref: 西班牙塞尔吉奥·加西亚 (Sergio Garcia) 参加过八届莱德杯，可谓一名老将，他成为历史上夺胜次数最高的欧洲人，共拿下 25.5 分。
src: A veteran of eight Ryder Cups, Spaniard Sergio Garcia became the tournaments all-time winningest European with 25.5 career point.

ref: “我平时都不怎么哭的，但今天我是真忍不住了。
src: "I don't usually cry but today I can't help it.

ref: 今年太难了。
src: It's been a rough year.

ref: 非常感谢托马斯选择了我，相信我。
src: So thankful for Thomas to pick me and believe in me.

ref: 我很高兴，很高兴能把奖杯夺回来。
src: I am so happy, so happy to get the cup back.

ref: 这是我们整个队的荣耀，我很高兴能够尽一份力”，加西亚在赢得欧洲比赛的胜利后情绪激动地介绍道。
src: It's about the team., and I'm happy I was able to help," said an emotional Garcia following the European victory.

ref: 他将火炬传递给他的同胞约翰·拉姆 (John Ram)，后者在周日的单打比赛中，以 2 比 1 的成绩击败了美国高尔夫传奇人物老虎·伍兹 (Tiger Woods)。
src: He passes the torch to his fellow countryman John Ram who took down US golf legend Tiger Woods 2&1 in singles play on Sunday.

ref: “我从小到大一直看着老虎·伍兹比赛，能击败他，我非常自豪”，23 岁的拉姆说道。
src: "The incredible pride I feel, to beat Tiger Woods, I grew up watching that guy," said 23-year-old Rahm.

ref: 伍兹输掉了在法国的四场比赛，在本次比赛中的战绩为 13-21-3，创下了莱德杯最低纪录。
src: Woods lost all four of his matches in France and now has a record of 13-21-3 career Ryder Cup record.

ref: 对于这位有史以来最伟大的选手，这串统计数据有些奇怪，因为他可谓仅次于杰克·尼克劳斯 (Jack Nicklaus)，赢得过 14 次重要比赛的冠军。
src: A strange statistic by one of the greatest players of all-time, having won 14 major titles second to only Jack Nicklaus.

ref: www赤潮更新：皮内拉斯县 (Pinellas)、马纳提县 (Manatee) 和萨拉索塔县 (Sarasota) 赤潮密度降低
src: Red Tide Update: Concentrations decrease in Pinellas, Manatee and Sarasota

ref: 佛罗里达州鱼类和野生动物保护委员会 (Florida Fish and Wildlife Commission, FWC) 的最新报告显示，坦帕湾 (Tampa Bay) 部分地区赤潮密度普遍下降。
src: The newest report from the Florida Fish and Wildlife Commission shows a general decrease in Red Tide concentrations for parts of the Tampa Bay area.

ref: 根据 FWC 介绍，皮内拉斯县 (Pinellas)、马纳提县 (Manatee) 、萨拉索塔 (Sarasota)、夏洛特县 (Charlotte) 和科利尔县 (Collier) 等地的更多水域的水华条件有所改善，这表明赤潮浓度在降低。
src: According to the FWC, patchier bloom conditions are being reported in areas of Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte and Collier counties - which suggests decreasing concentrations.

ref: 从皮内拉斯县北部，到李伊县 (Lee) 南部，长达约 130 英里（210 公里）的海岸线，出现赤潮水华现象。
src: A bloom the Red Tide extends approximately 130 miles of coastline from northern Pinellas to southern Lee counties.

ref: 希尔斯伯勒县 (Hillsborough County) 沿岸 10 英里（16 公里）范围内，可见分散的赤潮现象，与上周相比，面积有所减少。
src: Patches can be found about 10 miles offshore of Hillsborough County, but at fewer sites relative to last week.

ref: 帕斯科县 ( Pasco County) 也出现了赤潮。
src: Red Tide has also been observed in Pasco County.

ref: 过去一周，报告显示，赤潮密度：皮内拉斯县境内或沿岸为中等密度，希尔斯伯勒县沿岸有低有高，马纳提县为本底污染密度到高密度，萨拉索塔县境内或沿岸为本底污染密度到中等密度，夏洛特县 (Charlotte) 为本底污染密度到中等密度，李伊县境内或沿岸为本底污染密度到高密度，科利尔县为低密度。
src: Medium concentrations in or offshore of Pinellas County have been reported in the past week, low to high concentrations offshore of Hillsborough County, background to high concentrations in Manatee County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Sarasota County, background to medium concentrations in Charlotte County, background to high concentrations in or offshore of Lee County, and low concentrations in Collier County.

ref: 皮内拉斯县、马纳提县、萨拉索塔、李伊县和科利尔县的报告显示仍存在呼吸道刺激。
src: Respiratory irritation continues to be reported in Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Lee, and Collier counties.

ref: 而过去一周，佛罗里达州西北部报告不存在呼吸道刺激。
src: Respiratory irritation was not reported in Northwest Florida over the past week.
